original: BhP_02.01.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.01.001/1 varīyān eṣa te praśnaḥ kṛto lokahitaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: varīyān eṣa te praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ loka hitam nṛpa

original: BhP_02.01.001/3 ātmavitsammataḥ puṃsāṃ śrotavyādiṣu yaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: ātma vid sammataḥ puṃsām śrotavya ādiṣu yaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_02.01.002/1 śrotavyādīni rājendra nṛṇāṃ santi sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: śrotavya ādīni rāja indra nṛṇām santi sahasraśas

original: BhP_02.01.002/3 apaśyatām ātmatattvaṃ gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: apaśyatām ātma tattvam gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_02.01.003/1 nidrayā hriyate naktaṃ vyavāyena ca vā vayaḥ
analyzed: nidrayā hriyate naktam vyavāyena ca vā vayaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.003/3 divā cārthehayā rājan kuṭumbabharaṇena vā
analyzed: divā ca artha īhayā rājan kuṭumba bharaṇena vā

original: BhP_02.01.004/1 dehāpatyakalatrādiṣvātmasainyeṣvasatsvapi
analyzed: deha apatya kalatra ādiṣu ātma sainyeṣu asatsu api

original: BhP_02.01.004/3 teṣāṃ pramatto nidhanaṃ paśyann api na paśyati
analyzed: teṣām pramattaḥ nidhanam paśyan api na paśyati

original: BhP_02.01.005/1 tasmādbhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ
analyzed: tasmāt bhārata sarva ātmā bhagavān īśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_02.01.005/3 śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaśca smartavyaścecchatābhayam
analyzed: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaḥ ca smartavyaḥ ca icchatā abhayam

original: BhP_02.01.006/1 etāvān sāṅkhyayogābhyāṃ svadharmapariniṣṭhayā
analyzed: etāvān sāṅkhya yogābhyām svadharma pariniṣṭhayā

original: BhP_02.01.006/3 janmalābhaḥ paraḥ puṃsām ante nārāyaṇasmṛtiḥ
BhP_02.01.007/1 prāyeṇa munayo rājan nivṛttā vidhiṣedhataḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa munayaḥ rājan nivṛttāḥ

original: BhP_02.01.007/3 nairguṇyasthā ramante sma guṇānukathane hareḥ
analyzed: nairguṇya sthāḥ ramante sma guṇa anukathane hareḥ

original: BhP_02.01.008/1 idaṃ bhāgavataṃ nāma purāṇaṃ brahmasammitam
analyzed: idam bhāgavatam nāma purāṇam brahma sammitam

original: BhP_02.01.008/3 adhītavān dvāparādau piturdvaipāyanādaham
analyzed: adhītavān dvāpara ādau pituḥ dvaipāyanāt aham

original: BhP_02.01.009/1 pariniṣṭhito 'pi nairguṇya uttamaślokalīlayā
analyzed: pariniṣṭhitaḥ pi nairguṇye uttamaśloka līlayā

original: BhP_02.01.009/3 gṛhītacetā rājarṣe ākhyānaṃ yadadhītavān
analyzed: gṛhīta cetāḥ rājarṣe ākhyānam yat adhītavān

original: BhP_02.01.010/1 tadahaṃ te 'bhidhāsyāmi mahāpauruṣiko bhavān
analyzed: tat aham te bhidhāsyāmi mahā pauruṣikaḥ bhavān

original: BhP_02.01.010/3 yasya śraddadhatām āśu syān mukunde matiḥ satī
analyzed: yasya śraddadhatām āśu syāt mukunde matiḥ satī

original: BhP_02.01.011/1 etan nirvidyamānānām icchatām akutobhayam
analyzed: etat nirvidyamānānām icchatām akutobhayam

original: BhP_02.01.011/3 yogināṃ nṛpa nirṇītaṃ harernāmānukīrtanam
analyzed: yoginām nṛpa nirṇītam hareḥ nāma anukīrtanam

original: BhP_02.01.012/1 kiṃ pramattasya bahubhiḥ parokṣairhāyanairiha
analyzed: kim pramattasya bahubhiḥ parokṣaiḥ hāyanaiḥ iha

original: BhP_02.01.012/3 varaṃ muhūrtaṃ viditaṃ ghaṭate śreyase yataḥ
analyzed: varam muhūrtam viditam ghaṭate śreyase yatas

original: BhP_02.01.013/1 khaṭvāṅgo nāma rājarṣirjñātveyattām ihāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: khaṭvāṅgaḥ nāma rājarṣiḥ jñātvā iyattām iha āyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.013/3 muhūrtāt sarvam utsṛjya gatavān abhayaṃ harim
analyzed: muhūrtāt sarvam utsṛjya gatavān abhayam harim

original: BhP_02.01.014/1 tavāpyetarhi kauravya saptāhaṃ jīvitāvadhiḥ
analyzed: tava api etarhi kauravya sapta aham jīvita avadhiḥ

original: BhP_02.01.014/3 upakalpaya tat sarvaṃ tāvadyat sāmparāyikam
analyzed: upakalpaya tat sarvam tāvat yat sāmparāyikam

original: BhP_02.01.015/1 antakāle tu puruṣa āgate gatasādhvasaḥ
analyzed: antakāle tu puruṣaḥ āgate gata sādhvasaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.015/3 chindyādasaṅgaśastreṇa spṛhāṃ dehe 'nu ye ca tam
analyzed: chindyāt asaṅga śastreṇa spṛhām dehe nu ye ca tam

original: BhP_02.01.016/1 gṛhāt pravrajito dhīraḥ puṇyatīrthajalāplutaḥ
analyzed: gṛhāt pravrajitaḥ dhīraḥ puṇya tīrtha jala āplutaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.016/3 śucau vivikta āsīno vidhivat kalpitāsane
analyzed: śucau vivikte āsīnaḥ vidhivat kalpita āsane

original: BhP_02.01.017/1 abhyasen manasā śuddhaṃ trivṛdbrahmākṣaraṃ param
analyzed: abhyaset manasā śuddham trivṛt brahma akṣaram param

original: BhP_02.01.017/3 mano yacchej jitaśvāso brahmabījam avismaran
analyzed: manaḥ yacchet jita śvāsaḥ brahma bījam a vismaran

original: BhP_02.01.018/1 niyacchedviṣayebhyo 'kṣān manasā buddhisārathiḥ
analyzed: niyacchet viṣayebhyaḥ manasā buddhi sārathiḥ

original: BhP_02.01.018/3 manaḥ karmabhirākṣiptaṃ śubhārthe dhārayeddhiyā
analyzed: manaḥ karmabhiḥ ākṣiptam śubha arthe dhārayet dhiyā

original: BhP_02.01.019/1 tatraikāvayavaṃ dhyāyedavyucchinnena cetasā
analyzed: tatra eka avayavam dhyāyet avyucchinnena cetasā

original: BhP_02.01.019/3 mano nirviṣayaṃ yuktvā tataḥ kiñcana na smaret
analyzed: manaḥ nirviṣayam yuktvā tatas kiñcana na smaret

original: BhP_02.01.019/5 padaṃ tat paramaṃ viṣṇormano yatra prasīdati
analyzed: padam tat paramam viṣṇoḥ manaḥ yatra prasīdati

original: BhP_02.01.020/1 rajastamobhyām ākṣiptaṃ vimūḍhaṃ mana ātmanaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ tamobhyām ākṣiptam vimūḍham manaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.020/3 yaccheddhāraṇayā dhīro hanti yā tatkṛtaṃ malam
analyzed: yacchet dhāraṇayā dhīraḥ hanti yā tad kṛtam malam

original: BhP_02.01.021/1 yasyāṃ sandhāryamāṇāyāṃ yogino bhaktilakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yasyām sandhāryamāṇāyām yoginaḥ bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.021/3 āśu sampadyate yoga āśrayaṃ bhadram īkṣataḥ
analyzed: āśu sampadyate yogaḥ āśrayam bhadram īkṣataḥ

original: BhP_02.01.022/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_02.01.022/1 yathā sandhāryate brahman dhāraṇā yatra sammatā
analyzed: yathā sandhāryate brahman dhāraṇā yatra sammatā

original: BhP_02.01.022/3 yādṛśī vā haredāśu puruṣasya manomalam
analyzed: yādṛśī vā haret āśu puruṣasya manaḥ malam

original: BhP_02.01.023/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.01.023/1 jitāsano jitaśvāso jitasaṅgo jitendriyaḥ
BhP_02.01.023/3 sthūle bhagavato rūpe manaḥ sandhārayeddhiyā
analyzed: sthūle bhagavataḥ rūpe manaḥ sandhārayet dhiyā

original: BhP_02.01.024/1 viśeṣastasya deho 'yaṃ sthaviṣṭhaśca sthavīyasām
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ tasya dehaḥ yam sthaviṣṭhaḥ ca sthavīyasām

original: BhP_02.01.024/3 yatredaṃ vyajyate viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavac ca sat
analyzed: yatra idam vyajyate viśvam bhūtam bhavyam bhavat ca sat

original: BhP_02.01.025/1 aṇḍakośe śarīre 'smin saptāvaraṇasaṃyute
analyzed: aṇḍa kośe śarīre smin sapta āvaraṇa saṃyute

original: BhP_02.01.025/3 vairājaḥ puruṣo yo 'sau bhagavān dhāraṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: vairājaḥ puruṣaḥ yaḥ sau bhagavān dhāraṇā āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.026/1 pātālam etasya hi pādamūlaṃ paṭhanti pārṣṇiprapade rasātalam
analyzed: pātālam etasya hi pāda mūlam paṭhanti pārṣṇi prapade rasātalam

original: BhP_02.01.026/3 mahātalaṃ viśvasṛjo 'tha gulphau talātalaṃ vai puruṣasya jaṅghe
analyzed: mahātalam gulphau talātalam vai puruṣasya jaṅghe

original: BhP_02.01.027/1 dve jānunī sutalaṃ viśvamūrter ūrudvayaṃ vitalaṃ cātalaṃ ca
analyzed: dve jānunī sutalam viśvamūrteḥ ūru dvayam vitalam ca atalam ca

original: BhP_02.01.027/3 mahītalaṃ tajjaghanaṃ mahīpate nabhastalaṃ nābhisaro gṛṇanti
analyzed: mahī talam tad jaghanam mahīpate nabhastalam nābhi saraḥ gṛṇanti

original: BhP_02.01.028/1 uraḥsthalaṃ jyotiranīkam asya grīvā maharvadanaṃ vai jano 'sya
analyzed: uraḥ sthalam jyotiḥ anīkam asya grīvā mahar vadanam vai sya

original: BhP_02.01.028/3 tapo varāṭīṃ vidurādipuṃsaḥ satyaṃ tu śīrṣāṇi sahasraśīrṣṇaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ varāṭīm viduḥ ādi puṃsaḥ satyam tu śīrṣāṇi sahasra śīrṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.029/1 indrādayo bāhava āhurusrāḥ karṇau diśaḥ śrotram amuṣya śabdaḥ
analyzed: indra ādayaḥ bāhavaḥ āhuḥ usrāḥ karṇau diśaḥ śrotram amuṣya śabdaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.029/3 nāsatyadasrau paramasya nāse ghrāṇo 'sya gandho mukham agniriddhaḥ
analyzed: nāsatya dasrau paramasya nāse ghrāṇaḥ sya gandhaḥ mukham agniḥ iddhaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.030/1 dyaurakṣiṇī cakṣurabhūt pataṅgaḥ pakṣmāṇi viṣṇorahanī ubhe ca
analyzed: dyauḥ akṣiṇī cakṣuḥ abhūt pataṅgaḥ pakṣmāṇi viṣṇoḥ ahanī ubhe ca

original: BhP_02.01.030/3 tadbhrūvijṛmbhaḥ parameṣṭhidhiṣṇyam āpo 'sya tālū rasa eva jihvā
analyzed: tad bhrū vijṛmbhaḥ parameṣṭhi dhiṣṇyam āpaḥ sya tāluḥ rasaḥ eva jihvā

original: BhP_02.01.031/1 chandāṃsyanantasya śiro gṛṇanti daṃṣṭrā yamaḥ snehakalā dvijāni
analyzed: chandāṃsi anantasya śiraḥ gṛṇanti daṃṣṭrāḥ yamaḥ sneha kalāḥ dvijāni

original: BhP_02.01.031/3 hāso janonmādakarī ca māyā durantasargo yadapāṅgamokṣaḥ
analyzed: hāsaḥ jana unmāda karī ca māyā duranta sargaḥ yat apāṅga mokṣaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.032/1 vrīḍottarauṣṭho 'dhara eva lobho dharmaḥ stano 'dharmapatho 'sya pṛṣṭham
analyzed: vrīḍā uttara oṣṭhaḥ dharaḥ eva lobhaḥ dharmaḥ stanaḥ dharma pathaḥ sya pṛṣṭham

original: BhP_02.01.032/3 kastasya meḍhraṃ vṛṣaṇau ca mitrau kukṣiḥ samudrā girayo 'sthisaṅghāḥ
analyzed: kaḥ tasya meḍhram vṛṣaṇau ca mitrau kukṣiḥ samudrāḥ girayaḥ sthi saṅghāḥ

original: BhP_02.01.033/1 nāḍyo 'sya nadyo 'tha tanūruhāṇi mahīruhā viśvatanornṛpendra
analyzed: nāḍyaḥ sya nadyaḥ tha tanūruhāṇi mahīruhāḥ viśva tanoḥ nṛpa indra

original: BhP_02.01.033/3 anantavīryaḥ śvasitaṃ mātariśvā gatirvayaḥ karma guṇapravāhaḥ
analyzed: ananta vīryaḥ śvasitam mātariśvā gatiḥ vayaḥ karma guṇa pravāhaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.034/1 īśasya keśān vidurambuvāhān vāsastu sandhyāṃ kuruvarya bhūmnaḥ
analyzed: īśasya keśān viduḥ ambuvāhān vāsaḥ tu sandhyām kuru varya bhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.034/3 avyaktam āhurhṛdayaṃ manaścasa candramāḥ sarvavikārakośaḥ
analyzed: avyaktam āhuḥ hṛdayam manaḥ ca sa candramāḥ sarva vikāra kośaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.035/1 vijñānaśaktiṃ mahim āmananti sarvātmano 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ giritram
analyzed: vijñāna śaktim mahim āmananti sarvātmanaḥ ntaḥkaraṇam giritram

original: BhP_02.01.035/3 aśvāśvataryuṣṭragajā nakhāni sarve mṛgāḥ paśavaḥ śroṇideśe
analyzed: aśva aśvatarī uṣṭra gajāḥ nakhāni sarve mṛgāḥ paśavaḥ śroṇi deśe

original: BhP_02.01.036/1 vayāṃsi tadvyākaraṇaṃ vicitraṃ manurmanīṣā manujo nivāsaḥ
analyzed: vayāṃsi tad vyākaraṇam vicitram manuḥ manīṣā manujaḥ nivāsaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.036/3 gandharvavidyādharacāraṇāpsaraḥ svarasmṛtīrasurānīkavīryaḥ
analyzed: gandharva vidyādhara cāraṇa apsaraḥ svara smṛtīḥ asura anīka vīryaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.037/1 brahmānanaṃ kṣatrabhujo mahātmā viḍūruraṅghriśritakṛṣṇavarṇaḥ
analyzed: brahma ānanam kṣatra bhujaḥ mahātmā viś ūruḥ aṅghri śrita kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.037/3 nānābhidhābhījyagaṇopapanno dravyātmakaḥ karma vitānayogaḥ
analyzed: nānā abhidhā abhījya gaṇa upapannaḥ dravya ātmakaḥ karma vitāna yogaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.038/1 iyān asāvīśvaravigrahasya yaḥ sanniveśaḥ kathito mayā te
analyzed: iyān asau īśvara vigrahasya yaḥ sanniveśaḥ kathitaḥ mayā te

original: BhP_02.01.038/3 sandhāryate 'smin vapuṣi sthaviṣṭhe manaḥ svabuddhyā na yato 'sti kiñcit
analyzed: sandhāryate smin vapuṣi sthaviṣṭhe manaḥ sva buddhyā na yatas sti kiñcid

original: BhP_02.01.039/1 sa sarvadhīvṛttyanubhūtasarva ātmā yathā svapnajanekṣitaikaḥ
analyzed: sa sarva dhī vṛtti anubhūta sarvaḥ ātmā yathā svapna jana īkṣita ekaḥ

original: BhP_02.01.039/3 taṃ satyam ānandanidhiṃ bhajeta nānyatra sajjedyata ātmapātaḥ
analyzed: tam satyam ānanda nidhim bhajeta na anyatra sajjet yatas ātmapātaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.02.001/1 evaṃ purā dhāraṇayātmayonir naṣṭāṃ smṛtiṃ pratyavarudhya tuṣṭāt
analyzed: evam purā dhāraṇayā ātmayoniḥ naṣṭām smṛtim pratyavarudhya tuṣṭāt

original: BhP_02.02.001/3 tathā sasarjedam amoghadṛṣṭir yathāpyayāt prāg vyavasāyabuddhiḥ
analyzed: tathā sasarja idam amogha dṛṣṭiḥ yathā api ayāt prāk vyavasāya buddhiḥ

original: BhP_02.02.002/1 śābdasya hi brahmaṇa eṣa panthā yan nāmabhirdhyāyati dhīrapārthaiḥ
analyzed: śābdasya hi brahmaṇaḥ eṣa panthāḥ yat nāmabhiḥ dhyāyati dhīra pārthaiḥ

original: BhP_02.02.002/3 paribhramaṃstatra na vindate 'rthān māyāmaye vāsanayā śayānaḥ
analyzed: paribhraman tatra na vindate ṛthān māyā maye vāsanayā śayānaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.003/1 ataḥ kavirnāmasu yāvadarthaḥ syādapramatto vyavasāyabuddhiḥ
analyzed: atas kaviḥ nāmasu yāvat arthaḥ syāt apramattaḥ vyavasāya buddhiḥ

original: BhP_02.02.003/3 siddhe 'nyathārthe na yateta tatra pariśramaṃ tatra samīkṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: siddhe nyathā arthe na yateta tatra pariśramam tatra samīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.004/1 satyāṃ kṣitau kiṃ kaśipoḥ prayāsair bāhau svasiddhe hyupabarhaṇaiḥ kim
analyzed: satyām kṣitau kim kaśipoḥ prayāsaiḥ bāhau sva siddhe hi upabarhaṇaiḥ kim

original: BhP_02.02.004/3 satyañjalau kiṃ purudhānnapātryā digvalkalādau sati kiṃ dukūlaiḥ
analyzed: sati añjalau kim diś valkala ādau sati kim dukūlaiḥ

original: BhP_02.02.005/1 cīrāṇi kiṃ pathi na santi diśanti bhikṣāṃ
analyzed: cīrāṇi kim pathi na santi diśanti bhikṣām

original: BhP_02.02.005/2 naivāṅghripāḥ parabhṛtaḥ sarito 'pyaśuṣyan
analyzed: na eva aṅghripāḥ parabhṛtaḥ saritaḥ pi a śuṣyan

original: BhP_02.02.005/3 ruddhā guhāḥ kim ajito 'vati nopasannān
analyzed: ruddhāḥ guhāḥ kim ajitaḥ vati nā upasannān

original: BhP_02.02.005/4 kasmādbhajanti kavayo dhanadurmadāndhān
analyzed: kasmāt bhajanti kavayaḥ dhana durmada andhān

original: BhP_02.02.006/1 evaṃ svacitte svata eva siddha ātmā priyo 'rtho bhagavān anantaḥ
analyzed: evam sva citte svatas eva siddhe ātmā priyaḥ rthaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.006/3 taṃ nirvṛto niyatārtho bhajeta saṃsārahetūparamaśca yatra
analyzed: tam nirvṛtaḥ niyata arthaḥ bhajeta saṃsāra hetu uparamaḥ ca yatra

original: BhP_02.02.007/1 kastāṃ tvanādṛtya parānucintām ṛte paśūn asatīṃ nāma kuryāt
analyzed: kaḥ tām tu an ādṛtya para anucintām ṛte paśūn asatīm nāma kuryāt

original: BhP_02.02.007/3 paśyañ janaṃ patitaṃ vaitaraṇyāṃ svakarmajān paritāpāñ juṣāṇam
analyzed: paśyam janam patitam vaitaraṇyām sva karma jān paritāpām juṣāṇam

original: BhP_02.02.008/1 kecit svadehāntarhṛdayāvakāśe prādeśamātraṃ puruṣaṃ vasantam
analyzed: kecid sva deha antar hṛdaya avakāśe prādeśa mātram puruṣam vasantam

original: BhP_02.02.008/3 caturbhujaṃ kañjarathāṅgaśaṅkha gadādharaṃ dhāraṇayā smaranti
analyzed: catur bhujam kañja rathāṅga śaṅkha gadā dharam dhāraṇayā smaranti

original: BhP_02.02.009/1 rasannavaktraṃ nalināyatekṣaṇaṃ kadambakiñjalkapiśaṅgavāsasam
analyzed: nalina āyata īkṣaṇam kadamba kiñjalka piśaṅga vāsasam

original: BhP_02.02.009/3 lasanmahāratnahiraṇmayāṅgadaṃ sphuranmahāratnakirīṭakuṇḍalam
analyzed: lasat mahā ratna hiraṇmaya aṅgadam sphurat mahā ratna kirīṭa kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_02.02.010/1 unnidrahṛtpaṅkajakarṇikālaye yogeśvarāsthāpitapādapallavam
analyzed: unnidra hṛd paṅkaja karṇikā ālaye yogeśvara āsthāpita pāda pallavam

original: BhP_02.02.010/3 śrīlakṣaṇaṃ kaustubharatnakandharam amlānalakṣmyā vanamālayācitam
analyzed: śrī lakṣaṇam kaustubha ratna kandharam amlāna lakṣmyā vanamālayā ācitam

original: BhP_02.02.011/1 vibhūṣitaṃ mekhalayāṅgulīyakair mahādhanairnūpurakaṅkaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: vibhūṣitam mekhalayā aṅgulīyakaiḥ mahādhanaiḥ nūpura kaṅkaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_02.02.011/3 snigdhāmalākuñcitanīlakuntalair virocamānānanahāsapeśalam
analyzed: snigdha amala ākuñcita nīla kuntalaiḥ virocamāna ānana hāsa peśalam

original: BhP_02.02.012/1 adīnalīlāhasitekṣaṇollasad bhrūbhaṅgasaṃsūcitabhūryanugraham
analyzed: adīna līlā hasita īkṣaṇa ullasat bhrū bhaṅga saṃsūcita bhūri anugraham

original: BhP_02.02.012/3 īkṣeta cintāmayam enam īśvaraṃ yāvan mano dhāraṇayāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: īkṣeta cintām ayam enam īśvaram yāvat manaḥ dhāraṇayā avatiṣṭhate

original: BhP_02.02.013/1 ekaikaśo 'ṅgāni dhiyānubhāvayet pādādi yāvaddhasitaṃ gadābhṛtaḥ
analyzed: ekaikaśas ṅgāni dhiyā anubhāvayet pāda ādi yāvat hasitam gadābhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.013/3 jitaṃ jitaṃ sthānam apohya dhārayet paraṃ paraṃ śuddhyati dhīryathā yathā
analyzed: jitam jitam sthānam apohya dhārayet param param śuddhi ati dhīḥ yathā yathā

original: BhP_02.02.014/1 yāvan na jāyeta parāvare 'smin viśveśvare draṣṭari bhaktiyogaḥ
analyzed: yāvat na jāyeta parāvare smin viśveśvare draṣṭari bhakti yogaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.014/3 tāvat sthavīyaḥ puruṣasya rūpaṃ kriyāvasāne prayataḥ smareta
analyzed: tāvat sthavīyaḥ puruṣasya rūpam kriyā avasāne prayataḥ smareta

original: BhP_02.02.015/1 sthiraṃ sukhaṃ cāsanam āsthito yatir yadā jihāsurimam aṅga lokam
analyzed: sthiram sukham ca āsanam āsthitaḥ yatiḥ yadā jihāsuḥ imam aṅga lokam

original: BhP_02.02.015/3 kāle ca deśe ca mano na sajjayet prāṇān niyacchen manasā jitāsuḥ
analyzed: kāle ca deśe ca manaḥ na sajjayet prāṇān niyacchet manasā jita asuḥ

original: BhP_02.02.016/1 manaḥ svabuddhyāmalayā niyamya kṣetrajña etāṃ ninayet tam ātmani
analyzed: manaḥ sva buddhyā amalayā niyamya kṣetrajñaḥ etām ninayet tam ātmani

original: BhP_02.02.016/3 ātmānam ātmanyavarudhya dhīro labdhopaśāntirvirameta kṛtyāt
analyzed: ātmānam ātmani avarudhya dhīraḥ labdha upaśāntiḥ virameta kṛtyāt

original: BhP_02.02.017/1 na yatra kālo 'nimiṣāṃ paraḥ prabhuḥ kuto nu devā jagatāṃ ya īśire
analyzed: na yatra kālaḥ nimiṣām paraḥ prabhuḥ kutas nu devāḥ jagatām ye īśire

original: BhP_02.02.017/3 na yatra sattvaṃ na rajastamaśca na vai vikāro na mahān pradhānam
analyzed: na yatra sattvam na rajaḥ tamaḥ ca na vai vikāraḥ na mahān pradhānam

original: BhP_02.02.018/1 paraṃ padaṃ vaiṣṇavam āmananti tad yan neti netītyatadutsisṛkṣavaḥ
analyzed: param padam vaiṣṇavam āmananti tat yat na iti na iti iti a tad utsisṛkṣavaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.018/3 visṛjya daurātmyam ananyasauhṛdā hṛdopaguhyārhapadaṃ pade pade
analyzed: visṛjya daurātmyam ananya sauhṛdāḥ hṛdā upaguhya arha padam pade pade

original: BhP_02.02.019/1 itthaṃ munistūparamedvyavasthito vijñānadṛgvīryasurandhitāśayaḥ
analyzed: ittham muniḥ tu uparamet vyavasthitaḥ vijñāna dṛś vīrya su randhita āśayaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.019/3 svapārṣṇināpīḍya gudaṃ tato 'nilaṃ sthāneṣu ṣaṭsūnnamayej jitaklamaḥ
analyzed: sva pārṣṇinā āpīḍya gudam tatas nilam sthāneṣu ṣaṭsu unnamayet jita klamaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.020/1 nābhyāṃ sthitaṃ hṛdyadhiropya tasmād udānagatyorasi taṃ nayen muniḥ
analyzed: nābhyām sthitam hṛdi adhiropya tasmāt udāna gatyā urasi tam nayet muniḥ

original: BhP_02.02.020/3 tato 'nusandhāya dhiyā manasvī svatālumūlaṃ śanakairnayeta
analyzed: tatas nusandhāya dhiyā manasvī sva tālu mūlam śanakais nayeta

original: BhP_02.02.021/1 tasmādbhruvorantaram unnayeta niruddhasaptāyatano 'napekṣaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt bhruvoḥ antaram unnayeta niruddha sapta āyatanaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.021/3 sthitvā muhūrtārdham akuṇṭhadṛṣṭir nirbhidya mūrdhan visṛjet paraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: sthitvā muhūrta ardham akuṇṭha dṛṣṭiḥ nirbhidya mūrdhan visṛjet param gataḥ

original: BhP_02.02.022/1 yadi prayāsyan nṛpa pārameṣṭhyaṃ vaihāyasānām uta yadvihāram
analyzed: yadi prayāsyan nṛpa pārameṣṭhyam vaihāyasānām uta yat vihāram

original: BhP_02.02.022/3 aṣṭādhipatyaṃ guṇasannivāye sahaiva gacchen manasendriyaiśca
analyzed: aṣṭa ādhipatyam guṇa sannivāye saha eva gacchet manasā indriyaiḥ ca

original: BhP_02.02.023/1 yogeśvarāṇāṃ gatim āhurantar bahistrilokyāḥ pavanāntarātmanām
analyzed: yoga īśvarāṇām gatim āhuḥ antar bahis trilokyāḥ pavana antarātmanām

original: BhP_02.02.023/3 na karmabhistāṃ gatim āpnuvanti vidyātapoyogasamādhibhājām
analyzed: na karmabhiḥ tām gatim āpnuvanti vidyā tapaḥ yoga samādhi bhājām

original: BhP_02.02.024/1 vaiśvānaraṃ yāti vihāyasā gataḥ suṣumṇayā brahmapathena śociṣā
analyzed: vaiśvānaram yāti vihāyasā gataḥ suṣumṇayā brahma pathena śociṣā

original: BhP_02.02.024/3 vidhūtakalko 'tha harerudastāt prayāti cakraṃ nṛpa śaiśumāram
analyzed: hareḥ udastāt prayāti cakram nṛpa śaiśumāram

original: BhP_02.02.025/1 tadviśvanābhiṃ tvativartya viṣṇor aṇīyasā virajenātmanaikaḥ
analyzed: tad viśva nābhim tu ativartya viṣṇoḥ aṇīyasā virajena ātmanā ekaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.025/3 namaskṛtaṃ brahmavidām upaiti kalpāyuṣo yadvibudhā ramante
analyzed: namaskṛtam brahma vidām upaiti kalpa āyuṣaḥ yat vibudhāḥ ramante

original: BhP_02.02.026/1 atho anantasya mukhānalena dandahyamānaṃ sa nirīkṣya viśvam
analyzed: atho anantasya mukha analena dandahyamānam sa nirīkṣya viśvam

original: BhP_02.02.026/3 niryāti siddheśvarayuṣṭadhiṣṇyaṃ yaddvaiparārdhyaṃ tadu pārameṣṭhyam
analyzed: niryāti siddha īśvara yuṣṭa dhiṣṇyam yat vaiparārdhyam tat u pārameṣṭhyam

original: BhP_02.02.027/1 na yatra śoko na jarā na mṛtyur nārtirna codvega ṛte kutaścit
analyzed: na yatra śokaḥ na jarā na mṛtyuḥ na ārtiḥ na ca udvegaḥ ṛte kutaścid

original: BhP_02.02.027/3 yac cit tato 'daḥ kṛpayānidaṃvidāṃ durantaduḥkhaprabhavānudarśanāt
analyzed: yat cit tatas daḥ kṛpayā an idam vidām duranta duḥkha prabhava anudarśanāt

original: BhP_02.02.028/1 tato viśeṣaṃ pratipadya nirbhayas tenātmanāpo 'nalamūrtiratvaran
analyzed: tatas viśeṣam pratipadya nirbhayaḥ tena ātmanā apaḥ nala mūrtiḥ atvaran

original: BhP_02.02.028/3 jyotirmayo vāyum upetya kāle vāyvātmanā khaṃ bṛhadātmaliṅgam
analyzed: jyotiḥ mayaḥ vāyum upetya kāle vāyu ātmanā kham bṛhat ātma liṅgam

original: BhP_02.02.029/1 ghrāṇena gandhaṃ rasanena vai rasaṃ rūpaṃ ca dṛṣṭyā śvasanaṃ tvacaiva
analyzed: ghrāṇena gandham rasanena vai rasam rūpam ca dṛṣṭyā śvasanam tvacā eva

original: BhP_02.02.029/3 śrotreṇa copetya nabhoguṇatvaṃ prāṇena cākūtim upaiti yogī
analyzed: śrotreṇa ca upetya nabhaḥ guṇa tvam prāṇena ca ākūtim upaiti yogī

original: BhP_02.02.030/1 sa bhūtasūkṣmendriyasannikarṣaṃ manomayaṃ devamayaṃ vikāryam
analyzed: sa bhūta sūkṣma indriya sannikarṣam manaḥ mayam deva mayam vikāryam

original: BhP_02.02.030/3 saṃsādya gatyā saha tena yāti vijñānatattvaṃ guṇasannirodham
analyzed: saṃsādya gatyā saha tena yāti vijñāna tattvam guṇa sannirodham

original: BhP_02.02.031/1 tenātmanātmānam upaiti śāntam ānandam ānandamayo 'vasāne
analyzed: tena ātmanā ātmānam upaiti śāntam ānandam ānanda mayaḥ vasāne

original: BhP_02.02.031/3 etāṃ gatiṃ bhāgavatīṃ gato yaḥ sa vai punarneha viṣajjate 'ṅga
analyzed: etām gatim bhāgavatīm gataḥ yaḥ sa vai punar na iha viṣajjate ṅga

original: BhP_02.02.032/1 ete sṛtī te nṛpa vedagīte tvayābhipṛṣṭe ca sanātane ca
analyzed: ete sṛtī te nṛpa veda gīte tvayā abhipṛṣṭe ca sanātane ca

original: BhP_02.02.032/3 ye vai purā brahmaṇa āha tuṣṭa ārādhito bhagavān vāsudevaḥ
analyzed: ye vai purā brahmaṇaḥ āha tuṣṭaḥ ārādhitaḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ

original: BhP_02.02.033/1 na hyato 'nyaḥ śivaḥ panthā viśataḥ saṃsṛtāviha
analyzed: na hi atas nyaḥ śivaḥ panthāḥ viśataḥ saṃsṛtau iha

original: BhP_02.02.033/3 vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktiyogo yato bhavet
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti yogaḥ yatas bhavet

original: BhP_02.02.034/1 bhagavān brahma kārtsnyena triranvīkṣya manīṣayā
analyzed: bhagavān brahma kārtsnyena tris anvīkṣya manīṣayā

original: BhP_02.02.034/3 tadadhyavasyat kūṭastho ratirātman yato bhavet
analyzed: tat adhyavasyat kūṭasthaḥ ratiḥ ātman yatas bhavet

original: BhP_02.02.035/1 bhagavān sarvabhūteṣu lakṣitaḥ svātmanā hariḥ
analyzed: bhagavān sarva bhūteṣu lakṣitaḥ sva ātmanā hariḥ

original: BhP_02.02.035/3 dṛśyairbuddhyādibhirdraṣṭā lakṣaṇairanumāpakaiḥ
analyzed: dṛśyaiḥ buddhi ādibhiḥ draṣṭā lakṣaṇaiḥ anumāpakaiḥ

original: BhP_02.02.036/1 tasmāt sarvātmanā rājan hariḥ sarvatra sarvadā
analyzed: tasmāt sarva ātmanā rājan hariḥ sarvatra sarvadā

original: BhP_02.02.036/3 śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaśca smartavyo bhagavān nṛṇām
analyzed: śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaḥ ca smartavyaḥ bhagavān nṛṇām

original: BhP_02.02.037/1 pibanti ye bhagavata ātmanaḥ satāṃ kathāmṛtaṃ śravaṇapuṭeṣu sambhṛtam
analyzed: pibanti ye bhagavataḥ ātmanaḥ satām kathā amṛtam śravaṇa puṭeṣu sambhṛtam

original: BhP_02.02.037/3 punanti te viṣayavidūṣitāśayaṃ vrajanti taccaraṇasaroruhāntikam
analyzed: punanti te viṣaya vidūṣita āśayam vrajanti tad caraṇa saroruha antikam

original: BhP_02.03.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.03.001/1 evam etan nigaditaṃ pṛṣṭavān yadbhavān mama
analyzed: evam pṛṣṭavān yat bhavān mama

original: BhP_02.03.001/3 nṛṇāṃ yan mriyamāṇānāṃ manuṣyeṣu manīṣiṇām
analyzed: nṛṇām yat mriyamāṇānām manuṣyeṣu manīṣiṇām

original: BhP_02.03.002/1 brahmavarcasakāmastu yajeta brahmaṇaḥ patim
analyzed: brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ tu yajeta brahmaṇaḥ patim

original: BhP_02.03.002/3 indram indriyakāmastu prajākāmaḥ prajāpatīn
analyzed: indram indriya kāmaḥ tu prajā kāmaḥ prajāpatīn

original: BhP_02.03.003/1 devīṃ māyāṃ tu śrīkāmastejaskāmo vibhāvasum
analyzed: devīm māyām tu śrī kāmaḥ tejaskāmaḥ vibhāvasum

original: BhP_02.03.003/3 vasukāmo vasūn rudrān vīryakāmo 'tha vīryavān
analyzed: vasu kāmaḥ vasūn rudrān vīrya kāmaḥ tha vīryavān

original: BhP_02.03.004/1 annādyakāmastvaditiṃ svargakāmo 'diteḥ sutān
analyzed: annādya kāmaḥ tu aditim svarga kāmaḥ diteḥ sutān

original: BhP_02.03.004/3 viśvān devān rājyakāmaḥ sādhyān saṃsādhako viśām
analyzed: viśvān devān rājya kāmaḥ sādhyān saṃsādhakaḥ viśām

original: BhP_02.03.005/1 āyuṣkāmo 'śvinau devau puṣṭikāma ilāṃ yajet
analyzed: āyuṣkāmaḥ śvinau devau puṣṭi kāmaḥ ilām yajet

original: BhP_02.03.005/3 pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ puruṣo rodasī lokamātarau
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā kāmaḥ puruṣaḥ rodasī loka mātarau

original: BhP_02.03.006/1 rūpābhikāmo gandharvān strīkāmo 'psara urvaśīm
analyzed: rūpa abhikāmaḥ gandharvān strī kāmaḥ psaraḥ urvaśīm

original: BhP_02.03.006/3 ādhipatyakāmaḥ sarveṣāṃ yajeta parameṣṭhinam
analyzed: ādhipatya kāmaḥ sarveṣām yajeta parameṣṭhinam

original: BhP_02.03.007/1 yajñaṃ yajedyaśaskāmaḥ kośakāmaḥ pracetasam
analyzed: yajñam yajet yaśaskāmaḥ kośa kāmaḥ pracetasam

original: BhP_02.03.007/3 vidyākāmastu giriśaṃ dāmpatyārtha umāṃ satīm
analyzed: vidyā kāmaḥ tu giriśam dāmpatya arthe umām satīm

original: BhP_02.03.008/1 dharmārtha uttamaślokaṃ tantuḥ tanvan pitn yajet
analyzed: dharma arthe uttamaślokam tantuḥ tanvan yajet

original: BhP_02.03.008/3 rakṣākāmaḥ puṇyajanān ojaskāmo marudgaṇān
analyzed: rakṣā kāmaḥ puṇyajanān ojaskāmaḥ marut gaṇān

original: BhP_02.03.009/1 rājyakāmo manūn devān nirṛtiṃ tvabhicaran yajet
analyzed: rājya kāmaḥ manūn devān nirṛtim tu abhicaran yajet

original: BhP_02.03.009/3 kāmakāmo yajet somam akāmaḥ puruṣaṃ param
analyzed: kāma kāmaḥ yajet somam akāmaḥ puruṣam param

original: BhP_02.03.010/1 akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā mokṣakāma udāradhīḥ
analyzed: akāmaḥ sarva kāmaḥ vā mokṣa kāmaḥ udāra dhīḥ

original: BhP_02.03.010/3 tīvreṇa bhaktiyogena yajeta puruṣaṃ param
analyzed: tīvreṇa bhakti yogena yajeta puruṣam param

original: BhP_02.03.011/1 etāvān eva yajatām iha niḥśreyasodayaḥ
analyzed: etāvān eva iha niḥśreyasa udayaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.011/3 bhagavatyacalo bhāvo yadbhāgavatasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: bhagavati acalaḥ bhāvaḥ yat bhāgavata saṅgataḥ

original: BhP_02.03.012/1 jñānaṃ yadāpratinivṛttaguṇormicakram
analyzed: jñānam yadā a pratinivṛtta guṇa ūrmi cakram

original: BhP_02.03.012/2 ātmaprasāda uta yatra guṇeṣvasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: ātma prasādaḥ uta yatra guṇeṣu asaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.012/3 kaivalyasammatapathastvatha bhaktiyogaḥ
analyzed: kaivalya sammata pathaḥ tu atha bhakti yogaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.012/4 ko nirvṛto harikathāsu ratiṃ na kuryāt
analyzed: kaḥ nirvṛtaḥ hari kathāsu ratim na kuryāt

original: BhP_02.03.013/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.03.013/1 ityabhivyāhṛtaṃ rājā niśamya bharatarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: iti abhivyāhṛtam rājā niśamya bharata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.013/3 kim anyat pṛṣṭavān bhūyo vaiyāsakim ṛṣiṃ kavim
analyzed: kim anyat pṛṣṭavān bhūyas vaiyāsakim ṛṣim kavim

original: BhP_02.03.014/1 etac chuśrūṣatāṃ vidvan sūta no 'rhasi bhāṣitum
analyzed: etat śuśrūṣatām vidvan sūta naḥ rhasi bhāṣitum

original: BhP_02.03.014/3 kathā harikathodarkāḥ satāṃ syuḥ sadasi dhruvam
analyzed: kathāḥ hari kathā udarkāḥ satām syuḥ sadasi dhruvam

original: BhP_02.03.015/1 sa vai bhāgavato rājā pāṇḍaveyo mahārathaḥ
analyzed: sa vai bhāgavataḥ rājā pāṇḍaveyaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.015/3 bālakrīḍanakaiḥ krīḍan kṛṣṇakrīḍāṃ ya ādade
analyzed: bāla krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍan kṛṣṇa krīḍām yaḥ ādade

original: BhP_02.03.016/1 vaiyāsakiśca bhagavān vāsudevaparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: vaiyāsakiḥ ca bhagavān vāsudeva parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.016/3 urugāyaguṇodārāḥ satāṃ syurhi samāgame
analyzed: urugāya guṇa udārāḥ satām syuḥ hi samāgame

original: BhP_02.03.017/1 āyurharati vai puṃsām udyann astaṃ ca yann asau
analyzed: āyuḥ harati vai puṃsām udyan astam ca yan asau

original: BhP_02.03.017/3 tasyarte yatkṣaṇo nīta uttamaślokavārtayā
analyzed: tasya ṛte yat kṣaṇaḥ nītaḥ uttamaśloka vārtayā

original: BhP_02.03.018/1 taravaḥ kiṃ na jīvanti bhastrāḥ kiṃ na śvasantyuta
analyzed: taravaḥ kim na jīvanti bhastrāḥ kim na śvasanti uta

original: BhP_02.03.018/3 na khādanti na mehanti kiṃ grāme paśavo 'pare
analyzed: na khādanti na mehanti kim grāme paśavaḥ pare

original: BhP_02.03.019/1 śvaviḍvarāhoṣṭrakharaiḥ saṃstutaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ
analyzed: śva viḍvarāha uṣṭra kharaiḥ saṃstutaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ

original: BhP_02.03.019/3 na yatkarṇapathopeto jātu nāma gadāgrajaḥ
analyzed: na yat karṇa patha upetaḥ jātu nāma gadāgrajaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.020/1 bile batorukramavikramān ye na śṛṇvataḥ karṇapuṭe narasya
analyzed: bile bata urukrama vikramān ye na śṛṇvataḥ karṇa puṭe narasya

original: BhP_02.03.020/3 jihvāsatī dārdurikeva sūta na copagāyatyurugāyagāthāḥ
analyzed: jihvā satī dārdurikā iva sūta na ca upagāyati urugāya gāthāḥ

original: BhP_02.03.021/1 bhāraḥ paraṃ paṭṭakirīṭajuṣṭam apyuttamāṅgaṃ na namen mukundam
analyzed: bhāraḥ param paṭṭa kirīṭa juṣṭam api uttamāṅgam na namet mukundam

original: BhP_02.03.021/3 śāvau karau no kurute saparyāṃ harerlasatkāñcanakaṅkaṇau vā
analyzed: śāvau karau no kurute saparyām hareḥ lasat kāñcana kaṅkaṇau vā

original: BhP_02.03.022/1 barhāyite te nayane narāṇāṃ liṅgāni viṣṇorna nirīkṣato ye
analyzed: barhāyite te nayane narāṇām liṅgāni viṣṇoḥ na nirīkṣataḥ ye

original: BhP_02.03.022/3 pādau nṛṇāṃ tau drumajanmabhājau kṣetrāṇi nānuvrajato hareryau
analyzed: pādau nṛṇām tau druma janma bhājau kṣetrāṇi na anuvrajataḥ hareḥ yau

original: BhP_02.03.023/1 jīvañ chavo bhāgavatāṅghrireṇuṃ na jātu martyo 'bhilabheta yastu
analyzed: jīvam bhāgavata aṅghri reṇum na jātu martyaḥ bhilabheta yaḥ tu

original: BhP_02.03.023/3 śrīviṣṇupadyā manujastulasyāḥ śvasañ chavo yastu na veda gandham
analyzed: śrīviṣṇupadyā manujaḥ tulasyāḥ śvasam śavaḥ yaḥ tu na veda gandham

original: BhP_02.03.024/1 tadaśmasāraṃ hṛdayaṃ batedaṃ yadgṛhyamāṇairharināmadheyaiḥ
analyzed: tat aśmasāram hṛdayam bata idam yat gṛhyamāṇaiḥ hari nāmadheyaiḥ

original: BhP_02.03.024/3 na vikriyetātha yadā vikāro netre jalaṃ gātraruheṣu harṣaḥ
analyzed: na vikriyeta atha yadā vikāraḥ netre jalam gātraruheṣu harṣaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.025/1 athābhidhehyaṅga mano'nukūlaṃ prabhāṣase bhāgavatapradhānaḥ
analyzed: atha abhidhehi aṅga manonukūlam prabhāṣase bhāgavata pradhānaḥ

original: BhP_02.03.025/3 yadāha vaiyāsakirātmavidyā viśārado nṛpatiṃ sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: yat āha vaiyāsakiḥ ātma vidyāḥ viśāradaḥ nṛpatim sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.001/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.04.001/1 vaiyāsakeriti vacastattvaniścayam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: vaiyāsakeḥ iti vacaḥ tattva niścayam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.001/3 upadhārya matiṃ kṛṣṇe auttareyaḥ satīṃ vyadhāt
analyzed: upadhārya matim kṛṣṇe auttareyaḥ satīm vyadhāt

original: BhP_02.04.002/1 ātmajāyāsutāgāra paśudraviṇabandhuṣu
analyzed: ātma jāyā suta āgāra paśu draviṇa bandhuṣu

original: BhP_02.04.002/3 rājye cāvikale nityaṃ virūḍhāṃ mamatāṃ jahau
analyzed: rājye ca avikale nityam virūḍhām mamatām jahau

original: BhP_02.04.003/1 papraccha cemam evārthaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ
analyzed: papraccha ca imam eva artham yat mām pṛcchatha sattamāḥ

original: BhP_02.04.003/3 kṛṣṇānubhāvaśravaṇe śraddadhāno mahāmanāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa anubhāva śravaṇe śraddadhānaḥ mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_02.04.004/1 saṃsthāṃ vijñāya sannyasya karma traivargikaṃ ca yat
analyzed: saṃsthām vijñāya sannyasya karma traivargikam ca yat

original: BhP_02.04.004/3 vāsudeve bhagavati ātmabhāvaṃ dṛḍhaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati ātma bhāvam dṛḍham gataḥ

original: BhP_02.04.005/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_02.04.005/1 samīcīnaṃ vaco brahman sarvajñasya tavānagha
analyzed: samīcīnam vacaḥ brahman sarva jñasya tava anagha

original: BhP_02.04.005/3 tamo viśīryate mahyaṃ hareḥ kathayataḥ kathām
analyzed: tamaḥ viśīryate mahyam hareḥ kathayataḥ kathām

original: BhP_02.04.006/1 bhūya eva vivitsāmi bhagavān ātmamāyayā
analyzed: bhūyas eva vivitsāmi bhagavān ātma māyayā

original: BhP_02.04.006/3 yathedaṃ sṛjate viśvaṃ durvibhāvyam adhīśvaraiḥ
analyzed: yathā idam sṛjate viśvam durvibhāvyam adhīśvaraiḥ

original: BhP_02.04.007/1 yathā gopāyati vibhuryathā saṃyacchate punaḥ
analyzed: yathā gopāyati vibhuḥ yathā saṃyacchate punar

original: BhP_02.04.007/3 yāṃ yāṃ śaktim upāśritya puruśaktiḥ paraḥ pumān
analyzed: yām yām śaktim upāśritya puru śaktiḥ paraḥ pumān

original: BhP_02.04.007/5 ātmānaṃ krīḍayan krīḍan karoti vikaroti ca
analyzed: ātmānam krīḍayan krīḍan karoti vikaroti ca

original: BhP_02.04.008/1 nūnaṃ bhagavato brahman hareradbhutakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: nūnam bhagavataḥ brahman hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.008/3 durvibhāvyam ivābhāti kavibhiścāpi ceṣṭitam
analyzed: durvibhāvyam iva ābhāti kavibhiḥ ca api ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_02.04.009/1 yathā guṇāṃstu prakṛteryugapat kramaśo 'pi vā
analyzed: yathā guṇān tu prakṛteḥ yugapad vā

original: BhP_02.04.009/3 bibharti bhūriśastvekaḥ kurvan karmāṇi janmabhiḥ
analyzed: bibharti bhūriśas tu ekaḥ kurvan karmāṇi janmabhiḥ

original: BhP_02.04.010/1 vicikitsitam etan me bravītu bhagavān yathā
analyzed: vicikitsitam etat me bravītu bhagavān yathā

original: BhP_02.04.010/3 śābde brahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ parasmiṃśca bhavān khalu
analyzed: śābde brahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ parasmin ca bhavān khalu

original: BhP_02.04.011/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.04.011/1 ityupāmantrito rājñā guṇānukathane hareḥ
analyzed: iti upāmantritaḥ rājñā guṇa anukathane hareḥ

original: BhP_02.04.011/3 hṛṣīkeśam anusmṛtya prativaktuṃ pracakrame
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam anusmṛtya prativaktum pracakrame

original: BhP_02.04.012/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.04.012/1 namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya bhūyase sadudbhavasthānanirodhalīlayā
analyzed: namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya bhūyase sat udbhava sthāna nirodha līlayā

original: BhP_02.04.012/3 gṛhītaśaktitritayāya dehinām antarbhavāyānupalakṣyavartmane
analyzed: gṛhīta śakti tritayāya dehinām antarbhavāya anupalakṣya vartmane

original: BhP_02.04.013/1 bhūyo namaḥ sadvṛjinacchide 'satām asambhavāyākhilasattvamūrtaye
analyzed: bhūyas namaḥ sat vṛjina chide satām asambhavāya akhila sattva mūrtaye

original: BhP_02.04.013/3 puṃsāṃ punaḥ pāramahaṃsya āśrame vyavasthitānām anumṛgyadāśuṣe
analyzed: puṃsām punar pāramahaṃsye āśrame vyavasthitānām

original: BhP_02.04.014/1 namo namaste 'stvṛṣabhāya sātvatāṃ vidūrakāṣṭhāya muhuḥ kuyoginām
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te stu ṛṣabhāya sātvatām vidūra kāṣṭhāya muhur kuyoginām

original: BhP_02.04.014/3 nirastasāmyātiśayena rādhasā svadhāmani brahmaṇi raṃsyate namaḥ
analyzed: nirasta sāmya atiśayena rādhasā sva dhāmani brahmaṇi raṃsyate namaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.015/1 yatkīrtanaṃ yatsmaraṇaṃ yadīkṣaṇaṃ yadvandanaṃ yacchravaṇaṃ yadarhaṇam
analyzed: yad kīrtanam yad smaraṇam yad īkṣaṇam yad vandanam yad śravaṇam yad arhaṇam

original: BhP_02.04.015/3 lokasya sadyo vidhunoti kalmaṣaṃ tasmai subhadraśravase namo namaḥ
analyzed: lokasya sadyas vidhunoti kalmaṣam tasmai su bhadra śravase namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.016/1 vicakṣaṇā yaccaraṇopasādanāt saṅgaṃ vyudasyobhayato 'ntarātmanaḥ
analyzed: vicakṣaṇāḥ yad caraṇa upasādanāt saṅgam vyudasya ubhayatas ntarātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.016/3 vindanti hi brahmagatiṃ gataklamāstasmai subhadraśravase namo namaḥ
analyzed: vindanti hi brahma gatim gata klamāḥ tasmai su bhadra śravase namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.017/1 tapasvino dānaparā yaśasvino manasvino mantravidaḥ sumaṅgalāḥ
analyzed: tapasvinaḥ dāna parāḥ yaśasvinaḥ manasvinaḥ mantra vidaḥ su maṅgalāḥ

original: BhP_02.04.017/3 kṣemaṃ na vindanti vinā yadarpaṇaṃ tasmai subhadraśravase namo namaḥ
analyzed: kṣemam na vindanti vinā yad arpaṇam tasmai su bhadra śravase namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.018/1 kirātahūṇāndhrapulindapulkaśā ābhīraśumbhā yavanāḥ khasādayaḥ
analyzed: kirāta hūṇa āndhra pulinda pulkaśāḥ ābhīra śumbhāḥ yavanāḥ khasa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.018/3 ye 'nye ca pāpā yadapāśrayāśrayāḥ śudhyanti tasmai prabhaviṣṇave namaḥ
analyzed: ye nye ca pāpāḥ yad apāśraya āśrayāḥ śudhyanti tasmai prabhaviṣṇave namaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.019/1 sa eṣa ātmātmavatām adhīśvarastrayīmayo dharmamayastapomayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ ātmā ātmavatām adhīśvaraḥ trayī mayaḥ dharma mayaḥ tapaḥ mayaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.019/3 gatavyalīkairajaśaṅkarādibhirvitarkyaliṅgo bhagavān prasīdatām
analyzed: gata vyalīkaiḥ aja śaṅkara ādibhiḥ vitarkya liṅgaḥ bhagavān prasīdatām

original: BhP_02.04.020/1 śriyaḥ patiryajñapatiḥ prajāpatirdhiyāṃ patirlokapatirdharāpatiḥ
analyzed: śriyaḥ patiḥ yajñapatiḥ prajāpatiḥ dhiyām patiḥ lokapatiḥ dharāpatiḥ

original: BhP_02.04.020/3 patirgatiścāndhakavṛṣṇisātvatāṃ prasīdatāṃ me bhagavān satāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: patiḥ gatiḥ ca andhaka vṛṣṇi sātvatām prasīdatām me bhagavān satām patiḥ

original: BhP_02.04.021/1 yadaṅghryabhidhyānasamādhidhautayā dhiyānupaśyanti hi tattvam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yad aṅghri abhidhyāna samādhi dhautayā dhiyā anupaśyanti hi tattvam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.021/3 vadanti caitat kavayo yathārucaṃ sa me mukundo bhagavān prasīdatām
analyzed: vadanti ca etat kavayaḥ yathārucam sa me mukundaḥ bhagavān prasīdatām

original: BhP_02.04.022/1 pracoditā yena purā sarasvatī vitanvatājasya satīṃ smṛtiṃ hṛdi
analyzed: pracoditā yena purā sarasvatī vitanvatā ajasya satīm smṛtim hṛdi

original: BhP_02.04.022/3 svalakṣaṇā prādurabhūt kilāsyataḥ sa me ṛṣīṇām ṛṣabhaḥ prasīdatām
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇā prādurabhūt kilāsyataḥ sa me ṛṣīṇām ṛṣabhaḥ prasīdatām

original: BhP_02.04.023/1 bhūtairmahadbhirya imāḥ puro vibhurnirmāya śete yadamūṣu pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ mahadbhiḥ yaḥ imāḥ puras vibhuḥ nirmāya śete yat amūṣu pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_02.04.023/3 bhuṅkte guṇān ṣoḍaśa ṣoḍaśātmakaḥ so 'laṅkṛṣīṣṭa bhagavān vacāṃsi me
analyzed: bhuṅkte guṇān ṣoḍaśa ṣoḍaśa ātmakaḥ saḥ bhagavān vacāṃsi me

original: BhP_02.04.024/1 namastasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase

original: BhP_02.04.024/3 papurjñānam ayaṃ saumyā yanmukhāmburuhāsavam
analyzed: papuḥ jñānam ayam saumyāḥ yad mukha amburuha āsavam

original: BhP_02.04.025/1 etadevātmabhū rājan nāradāya vipṛcchate
analyzed: rājan nāradāya vipṛcchate

original: BhP_02.04.025/3 vedagarbho 'bhyadhāt sākṣādyadāha harirātmanaḥ
analyzed: vedagarbhaḥ bhyadhāt sākṣāt yat āha hariḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.001/0 nārada uvāca
analyzed: nāradaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.05.001/1 devadeva namaste 'stu bhūtabhāvana pūrvaja
analyzed: devadeva namaḥ te stu bhūtabhāvana pūrvaja

original: BhP_02.05.001/3 tadvijānīhi yaj jñānam ātmatattvanidarśanam
analyzed: tat vijānīhi yat jñānam ātma tattva nidarśanam

original: BhP_02.05.002/1 yadrūpaṃ yadadhiṣṭhānaṃ yataḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ prabho
analyzed: yad rūpam yad adhiṣṭhānam yatas sṛṣṭam idam prabho

original: BhP_02.05.002/3 yat saṃsthaṃ yat paraṃ yac ca tat tattvaṃ vada tattvataḥ
analyzed: yat saṃstham yat param yat ca tat tattvam vada tattvataḥ

original: BhP_02.05.003/1 sarvaṃ hyetadbhavān veda bhūtabhavyabhavatprabhuḥ
analyzed: sarvam hi etat bhavān veda bhūta bhavya bhavat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_02.05.003/3 karāmalakavadviśvaṃ vijñānāvasitaṃ tava
analyzed: kara āmalaka vat viśvam vijñāna avasitam tava

original: BhP_02.05.004/1 yadvijñāno yadādhāro yatparastvaṃ yadātmakaḥ
analyzed: yad vijñānaḥ yad ādhāraḥ yad paraḥ tvam yad ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.004/3 ekaḥ sṛjasi bhūtāni bhūtairevātmamāyayā
analyzed: ekaḥ sṛjasi bhūtāni bhūtaiḥ eva ātma māyayā

original: BhP_02.05.005/1 ātman bhāvayase tāni na parābhāvayan svayam
analyzed: ātman bhāvayase tāni na parābhāvayan svayam

original: BhP_02.05.005/3 ātmaśaktim avaṣṭabhya ūrṇanābhirivāklamaḥ
analyzed: ātma śaktim avaṣṭabhya ūrṇanābhiḥ iva aklamaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.006/1 nāhaṃ veda paraṃ hyasmin nāparaṃ na samaṃ vibho
analyzed: na aham veda param hi asmin na aparam na samam vibho

original: BhP_02.05.006/3 nāmarūpaguṇairbhāvyaṃ sadasat kiñcidanyataḥ
analyzed: nāma rūpa guṇaiḥ bhāvyam sat asat kiñcid anyatas

original: BhP_02.05.007/1 sa bhavān acaradghoraṃ yat tapaḥ susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: sa bhavān acarat ghoram yat tapaḥ su samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.007/3 tena khedayase nastvaṃ parāśaṅkāṃ ca yacchasi
analyzed: tena khedayase naḥ tvam para āśaṅkām ca yacchasi

original: BhP_02.05.008/1 etan me pṛcchataḥ sarvaṃ sarvajña sakaleśvara
analyzed: etat me pṛcchataḥ sarvam sarvajña sakala īśvara

original: BhP_02.05.008/3 vijānīhi yathaivedam ahaṃ budhye 'nuśāsitaḥ
analyzed: vijānīhi yathā evā idam aham budhye nuśāsitaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.009/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_02.05.009/1 samyak kāruṇikasyedaṃ vatsa te vicikitsitam
analyzed: samyak kāruṇikasya idam vatsa te vicikitsitam

original: BhP_02.05.009/3 yadahaṃ coditaḥ saumya bhagavadvīryadarśane
analyzed: yat aham coditaḥ saumya bhagavat vīrya darśane

original: BhP_02.05.010/1 nānṛtaṃ tava tac cāpi yathā māṃ prabravīṣi bhoḥ
analyzed: na anṛtam tava tat ca api yathā mām prabravīṣi bhoḥ

original: BhP_02.05.010/3 avijñāya paraṃ matta etāvat tvaṃ yato hi me
analyzed: a vijñāya param mattaḥ etāvat tvam yatas hi me

original: BhP_02.05.011/1 yena svarociṣā viśvaṃ rocitaṃ rocayāmyaham
analyzed: yena sva rociṣā viśvam rocitam rocayāmi aham

original: BhP_02.05.011/3 yathārko 'gniryathā somo yatharkṣagrahatārakāḥ
analyzed: yathā arkaḥ gniḥ yathā somaḥ yathā ṛkṣa graha tārakāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.012/1 tasmai namo bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi

original: BhP_02.05.012/3 yanmāyayā durjayayā māṃ vadanti jagadgurum
analyzed: yad māyayā durjayayā mām vadanti jagadgurum

original: BhP_02.05.013/1 vilajjamānayā yasya sthātum īkṣāpathe 'muyā
analyzed: vilajjamānayā yasya sthātum īkṣā pathe muyā

original: BhP_02.05.013/3 vimohitā vikatthante mamāham iti durdhiyaḥ
analyzed: vimohitāḥ vikatthante mama aham iti

original: BhP_02.05.014/1 dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca
analyzed: dravyam karma ca kālaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_02.05.014/3 vāsudevāt paro brahman na cānyo 'rtho 'sti tattvataḥ
analyzed: vāsudevāt paraḥ brahman na ca anyaḥ rthaḥ sti tattvataḥ

original: BhP_02.05.015/1 nārāyaṇaparā vedā devā nārāyaṇāṅgajāḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa parāḥ vedāḥ devāḥ nārāyaṇa aṅgajāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.015/3 nārāyaṇaparā lokā nārāyaṇaparā makhāḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa parāḥ lokāḥ nārāyaṇa parāḥ makhāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.016/1 nārāyaṇaparo yogo nārāyaṇaparaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa paraḥ yogaḥ nārāyaṇa param tapaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.016/3 nārāyaṇaparaṃ jñānaṃ nārāyaṇaparā gatiḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa param jñānam nārāyaṇa parā gatiḥ

original: BhP_02.05.017/1 tasyāpi draṣṭurīśasya kūṭasthasyākhilātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya api draṣṭuḥ īśasya kūṭasthasya akhilātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.017/3 sṛjyaṃ sṛjāmi sṛṣṭo 'ham īkṣayaivābhicoditaḥ
analyzed: sṛjyam sṛjāmi sṛṣṭaḥ ham īkṣaya eva abhicoditaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.018/1 sattvaṃ rajastama iti nirguṇasya guṇāstrayaḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti nirguṇasya guṇāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.018/3 sthitisarganirodheṣu gṛhītā māyayā vibhoḥ
analyzed: sthiti sarga nirodheṣu gṛhītāḥ māyayā vibhoḥ

original: BhP_02.05.019/1 kāryakāraṇakartṛtve dravyajñānakriyāśrayāḥ
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ tve dravya jñāna kriyā āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.019/3 badhnanti nityadā muktaṃ māyinaṃ puruṣaṃ guṇāḥ
analyzed: badhnanti nityadā muktam māyinam puruṣam guṇāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.020/1 sa eṣa bhagavāṃl liṅgaistribhiretairadhokṣajaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhagavān liṅgaiḥ tribhiḥ etaiḥ adhokṣajaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.020/3 svalakṣitagatirbrahman sarveṣāṃ mama ceśvaraḥ
analyzed: sva lakṣita gatiḥ brahman sarveṣām mama ca īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_02.05.021/1 kālaṃ karma svabhāvaṃ ca māyeśo māyayā svayā
analyzed: kālam karma svabhāvam ca māyā īśaḥ māyayā svayā

original: BhP_02.05.021/3 ātman yadṛcchayā prāptaṃ vibubhūṣurupādade
analyzed: ātman yadṛcchayā prāptam vibubhūṣuḥ upādade

original: BhP_02.05.022/1 kālādguṇavyatikaraḥ pariṇāmaḥ svabhāvataḥ
analyzed: kālāt guṇa vyatikaraḥ pariṇāmaḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: BhP_02.05.022/3 karmaṇo janma mahataḥ puruṣādhiṣṭhitādabhūt
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ janma mahataḥ puruṣa dhiṣṭhitāt abhūt

original: BhP_02.05.023/1 mahatastu vikurvāṇādrajaḥsattvopabṛṃhitāt
analyzed: mahataḥ tu vikurvāṇāt rajaḥ sattva upabṛṃhitāt

original: BhP_02.05.023/3 tamaḥpradhānastvabhavaddravyajñānakriyātmakaḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ pradhānaḥ tu abhavat dravya jñāna kriyā ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.024/1 so 'haṅkāra iti prokto vikurvan samabhūt tridhā
analyzed: saḥ haṅkāraḥ iti proktaḥ vikurvan samabhūt tridhā

original: BhP_02.05.024/3 vaikārikastaijasaśca tāmasaśceti yadbhidā
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti yad bhidā

original: BhP_02.05.024/5 dravyaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktirjñānaśaktiriti prabho
analyzed: dravya śaktiḥ kriyā śaktiḥ jñāna śaktiḥ iti prabho

original: BhP_02.05.025/1 tāmasādapi bhūtādervikurvāṇādabhūn nabhaḥ
analyzed: tāmasāt api bhūtādeḥ vikurvāṇāt abhūt nabhaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.025/3 tasya mātrā guṇaḥ śabdo liṅgaṃ yaddraṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ
analyzed: tasya mātrā guṇaḥ śabdaḥ liṅgam yat draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ

original: BhP_02.05.026/1 nabhaso 'tha vikurvāṇādabhūt sparśaguṇo 'nilaḥ
analyzed: vikurvāṇāt abhūt sparśa guṇaḥ nilaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.026/3 parānvayāc chabdavāṃśca prāṇa ojaḥ saho balam
analyzed: parānvayāt śabdavān ca prāṇaḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ balam

original: BhP_02.05.027/1 vāyorapi vikurvāṇāt kālakarmasvabhāvataḥ
analyzed: vāyoḥ api vikurvāṇāt kāla karma svabhāvataḥ

original: BhP_02.05.027/3 udapadyata tejo vai rūpavat sparśaśabdavat
analyzed: udapadyata tejaḥ vai rūpavat sparśa śabdavat

original: BhP_02.05.028/1 tejasastu vikurvāṇādāsīdambho rasātmakam
analyzed: tejasaḥ tu vikurvāṇāt āsīt ambhaḥ rasa ātmakam

original: BhP_02.05.028/3 rūpavat sparśavac cāmbho ghoṣavac ca parānvayāt
analyzed: rūpavat sparśavat ca ambhaḥ ghoṣavat ca parānvayāt

original: BhP_02.05.029/1 viśeṣastu vikurvāṇādambhaso gandhavān abhūt
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ tu vikurvāṇāt ambhasaḥ gandhavān abhūt

original: BhP_02.05.029/3 parānvayādrasasparśa śabdarūpaguṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: parā anvayāt rasa sparśa śabda rūpa guṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.030/1 vaikārikān mano jajñe devā vaikārikā daśa
analyzed: vaikārikāt manaḥ jajñe devāḥ vaikārikāḥ daśa

original: BhP_02.05.030/3 digvātārkapraceto 'śvi vahnīndropendramitrakāḥ
analyzed: diś vāta arka pracetaḥ śvi vahni indra upendra mitrakāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.031/1 taijasāt tu vikurvāṇādindriyāṇi daśābhavan
analyzed: taijasāt tu vikurvāṇāt indriyāṇi daśa abhavan

original: BhP_02.05.031/3 jñānaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktirbuddhiḥ prāṇaśca taijasau
analyzed: jñāna śaktiḥ kriyā śaktiḥ buddhiḥ prāṇaḥ ca taijasau

original: BhP_02.05.031/5 śrotraṃ tvagghrāṇadṛgjihvā vāgdormeḍhrāṅghripāyavaḥ
analyzed: śrotram tvac ghrāṇa dṛś jihvā vāc dos meḍhra aṅghri pāyavaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.032/1 yadaite 'saṅgatā bhāvā bhūtendriyamanoguṇāḥ
analyzed: yadā ete saṅga tāḥ bhāvāḥ bhūta indriya manaḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.032/3 yadāyatananirmāṇe na śekurbrahmavittama
analyzed: yad āyatana nirmāṇe na śekuḥ brahma vittama

original: BhP_02.05.033/1 tadā saṃhatya cānyonyaṃ bhagavacchakticoditāḥ
analyzed: tadā saṃhatya ca anyonyam bhagavat śakti coditāḥ

original: BhP_02.05.033/3 sadasattvam upādāya cobhayaṃ sasṛjurhyadaḥ
analyzed: sat asat tvam upādāya ca ubhayam sasṛjuḥ hi adaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.034/1 varṣapūgasahasrānte tadaṇḍam udake śayam
analyzed: varṣa pūga sahasra ante tat aṇḍam udake śayam

original: BhP_02.05.034/3 kālakarmasvabhāvastho jīvo ñjīvam ajīvayat
analyzed: kāla karma svabhāva sthaḥ jīvaḥ ñjīvam ajīvayat

original: BhP_02.05.035/1 sa eva puruṣastasmādaṇḍaṃ nirbhidya nirgataḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva puruṣaḥ tasmāt aṇḍam nirbhidya nirgataḥ

original: BhP_02.05.035/3 sahasrorvaṅghribāhvakṣaḥ sahasrānanaśīrṣavān
BhP_02.05.036/1 yasyehāvayavairlokān kalpayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: yasya iha avayavaiḥ lokān kalpayanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.036/3 kaṭyādibhiradhaḥ sapta saptordhvaṃ jaghanādibhiḥ
analyzed: kaṭi ādibhiḥ adhas sapta sapta ūrdhvam jaghana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_02.05.037/1 puruṣasya mukhaṃ brahma kṣatram etasya bāhavaḥ
analyzed: puruṣasya mukham brahma kṣatram etasya bāhavaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.037/3 ūrvorvaiśyo bhagavataḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro vyajāyata
analyzed: ūrvoḥ vaiśyaḥ bhagavataḥ padbhyām śūdraḥ vyajāyata

original: BhP_02.05.038/1 bhūrlokaḥ kalpitaḥ padbhyāṃ bhuvarloko 'sya nābhitaḥ
analyzed: bhūrlokaḥ kalpitaḥ padbhyām nābhitaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.038/3 hṛdā svarloka urasā maharloko mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: hṛdā svarlokaḥ urasā mahar lokaḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.039/1 grīvāyāṃ janaloko 'sya tapolokaḥ stanadvayāt
analyzed: grīvāyām tapolokaḥ stana dvayāt

original: BhP_02.05.039/3 mūrdhabhiḥ satyalokastu brahmalokaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: mūrdhabhiḥ satyalokaḥ tu brahma lokaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.040/1 tatkaṭyāṃ cātalaṃ kḷptam ūrubhyāṃ vitalaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: tad kaṭyām ca atalam kḷptam ūrubhyām vitalam vibhoḥ

original: BhP_02.05.040/3 jānubhyāṃ sutalaṃ śuddhaṃ jaṅghābhyāṃ tu talātalam
analyzed: jānubhyām sutalam śuddham jaṅghābhyām tu talātalam

original: BhP_02.05.041/1 mahātalaṃ tu gulphābhyāṃ prapadābhyāṃ rasātalam
analyzed: mahātalam tu gulphābhyām prapadābhyām rasātalam

original: BhP_02.05.041/3 pātālaṃ pādatalata iti lokamayaḥ pumān
analyzed: pātālam pāda talataḥ iti loka mayaḥ pumān

original: BhP_02.05.042/1 bhūrlokaḥ kalpitaḥ padbhyāṃ bhuvarloko 'sya nābhitaḥ
analyzed: bhūrlokaḥ kalpitaḥ padbhyām nābhitaḥ

original: BhP_02.05.042/3 svarlokaḥ kalpito mūrdhnā iti vā lokakalpanā
analyzed: svarlokaḥ kalpitaḥ mūrdhnā iti vā loka kalpanā

original: BhP_02.06.001/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_02.06.001/1 vācāṃ vahnermukhaṃ kṣetraṃ chandasāṃ sapta dhātavaḥ
analyzed: vācām vahneḥ mukham kṣetram chandasām sapta dhātavaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.001/3 havyakavyāmṛtānnānāṃ jihvā sarvarasasya ca
analyzed: havya kavya amṛta annānām jihvā sarva rasasya ca

original: BhP_02.06.002/1 sarvāsūnāṃ ca vāyośca tannāse paramāyaṇe
analyzed: sarva asūnām ca vāyoḥ ca tat nāse

original: BhP_02.06.002/3 aśvinoroṣadhīnāṃ ca ghrāṇo modapramodayoḥ
analyzed: aśvinoḥ oṣadhīnām ca ghrāṇaḥ moda pramodayoḥ

original: BhP_02.06.003/1 rūpāṇāṃ tejasāṃ cakṣurdivaḥ sūryasya cākṣiṇī
analyzed: rūpāṇām tejasām cakṣuḥ divaḥ sūryasya ca akṣiṇī

original: BhP_02.06.003/3 karṇau diśāṃ ca tīrthānāṃ śrotram ākāśaśabdayoḥ
analyzed: karṇau diśām ca tīrthānām śrotram ākāśa śabdayoḥ

original: BhP_02.06.003/5 tadgātraṃ vastusārāṇāṃ saubhagasya ca bhājanam
analyzed: tad gātram vastu sārāṇām saubhagasya ca bhājanam

original: BhP_02.06.004/1 tvag asya sparśavāyośca sarvamedhasya caiva hi
analyzed: tvac asya sparśa vāyoḥ ca sarva medhasya ca eva hi

original: BhP_02.06.004/3 romāṇyudbhijjajātīnāṃ yairvā yajñastu sambhṛtaḥ
analyzed: romāṇi udbhid ja jātīnām yaiḥ vā yajñaḥ tu sambhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.005/1 keśaśmaśrunakhānyasya śilālohābhravidyutām
analyzed: keśa śmaśru nakhāni asya śilā loha abhra vidyutām

original: BhP_02.06.005/3 bāhavo lokapālānāṃ prāyaśaḥ kṣemakarmaṇām
analyzed: bāhavaḥ lokapālānām prāyaśas kṣema karmaṇām

original: BhP_02.06.006/1 vikramo bhūrbhuvaḥ svaśca kṣemasya śaraṇasya ca
analyzed: vikramaḥ bhūrbhuvaḥ svar ca kṣemasya śaraṇasya ca

original: BhP_02.06.006/3 sarvakāmavarasyāpi hareścaraṇa āspadam
analyzed: sarva kāma varasya api hareḥ caraṇaḥ āspadam

original: BhP_02.06.007/1 apāṃ vīryasya sargasya parjanyasya prajāpateḥ
analyzed: apām vīryasya sargasya parjanyasya prajāpateḥ

original: BhP_02.06.007/3 puṃsaḥ śiśna upasthastu prajātyānandanirvṛteḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ śiśnaḥ upasthaḥ tu prajā ati ānanda nirvṛteḥ

original: BhP_02.06.008/1 pāyuryamasya mitrasya parimokṣasya nārada
analyzed: pāyuḥ yamasya mitrasya parimokṣasya nārada

original: BhP_02.06.008/3 hiṃsāyā nirṛtermṛtyornirayasya gudaṃ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: hiṃsāyāḥ nirṛteḥ mṛtyoḥ nirayasya gudam smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.009/1 parābhūteradharmasya tamasaścāpi paścimaḥ
analyzed: parābhūteḥ adharmasya tamasaḥ ca api paścimaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.009/3 nāḍyo nadanadīnāṃ ca gotrāṇām asthisaṃhatiḥ
analyzed: nāḍyaḥ nada nadīnām ca gotrāṇām asthi saṃhatiḥ

original: BhP_02.06.010/1 avyaktarasasindhūnāṃ bhūtānāṃ nidhanasya ca
analyzed: avyakta rasa sindhūnām bhūtānām nidhanasya ca

original: BhP_02.06.010/3 udaraṃ viditaṃ puṃso hṛdayaṃ manasaḥ padam
analyzed: udaram viditam puṃsaḥ hṛdayam manasaḥ padam

original: BhP_02.06.011/1 dharmasya mama tubhyaṃ ca kumārāṇāṃ bhavasya ca
analyzed: dharmasya mama tubhyam ca kumārāṇām bhavasya ca

original: BhP_02.06.011/3 vijñānasya ca sattvasya parasyātmā parāyaṇam
analyzed: vijñānasya ca sattvasya parasya ātmā parāyaṇam

original: BhP_02.06.012/1 ahaṃ bhavān bhavaścaiva ta ime munayo 'grajāḥ
analyzed: aham bhavān bhavaḥ ca eva te ime munayaḥ grajāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.012/3 surāsuranarā nāgāḥ khagā mṛgasarīsṛpāḥ
analyzed: sura asura narāḥ nāgāḥ khagāḥ mṛga sarīsṛpāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.013/1 gandharvāpsaraso yakṣā rakṣobhūtagaṇoragāḥ
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ yakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ bhūta gaṇa uragāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.013/3 paśavaḥ pitaraḥ siddhā vidyādhrāścāraṇā drumāḥ
analyzed: paśavaḥ pitaraḥ siddhāḥ vidyādhrāḥ cāraṇāḥ drumāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.014/1 anye ca vividhā jīvājalasthalanabhaukasaḥ
analyzed: anye ca vividhāḥ jīvā jala sthala nabha okasaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.014/3 graharkṣaketavastārāstaḍitaḥ stanayitnavaḥ
analyzed: graha ṛkṣa ketavaḥ tārāḥ taḍitaḥ stanayitnavaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.015/1 sarvaṃ puruṣa evedaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavac ca yat
analyzed: sarvam puruṣaḥ eva idam bhūtam bhavyam bhavat ca yat

original: BhP_02.06.015/3 tenedam āvṛtaṃ viśvaṃ vitastim adhitiṣṭhati
analyzed: tena idam āvṛtam viśvam vitastim adhitiṣṭhati

original: BhP_02.06.016/1 svadhiṣṇyaṃ pratapan prāṇo bahiśca pratapatyasau
analyzed: sva dhiṣṇyam pratapan prāṇaḥ bahis ca pratapati asau

original: BhP_02.06.016/3 evaṃ virājaṃ pratapaṃstapatyantarbahiḥ pumān
analyzed: evam virājam pratapan tapati antar bahis pumān

original: BhP_02.06.017/1 so 'mṛtasyābhayasyeśo martyam annaṃ yadatyagāt
analyzed: saḥ mṛtasya abhayasya īśaḥ martyam annam yat atyagāt

original: BhP_02.06.017/3 mahimaiṣa tato brahman puruṣasya duratyayaḥ
analyzed: mahimā eṣa tatas brahman puruṣasya duratyayaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.018/1 pādeṣu sarvabhūtāni puṃsaḥ sthitipado viduḥ
analyzed: pādeṣu sarva bhūtāni puṃsaḥ sthiti padaḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_02.06.018/3 amṛtaṃ kṣemam abhayaṃ trimūrdhno 'dhāyi mūrdhasu
analyzed: amṛtam kṣemam abhayam tri mūrdhnaḥ dhāyi mūrdhasu

original: BhP_02.06.019/1 pādāstrayo bahiścāsann aprajānāṃ ya āśramāḥ
analyzed: pādāḥ trayaḥ bahis ca āsan aprajānām ye āśramāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.019/3 antastrilokyāstvaparo gṛhamedho 'bṛhadvrataḥ
analyzed: antar trilokyāḥ tu aparaḥ gṛhamedhaḥ bṛhat vrataḥ

original: BhP_02.06.020/1 sṛtī vicakrame viśvam sāśanānaśane ubhe
analyzed: sṛtī vicakrame viśvam sa aśana anaśane ubhe

original: BhP_02.06.020/3 yadavidyā ca vidyā ca puruṣastūbhayāśrayaḥ
analyzed: yat avidyā ca vidyā ca puruṣaḥ tu ubhaya āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.021/1 yasmādaṇḍaṃ virāḍjajñe bhūtendriyaguṇātmakaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt aṇḍam virāj jajñe bhūta indriya guṇa ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.021/3 taddravyam atyagādviśvaṃ gobhiḥ sūrya ivātapan
analyzed: tat dravyam atyagāt viśvam gobhiḥ sūryaḥ iva ātapan

original: BhP_02.06.022/1 yadāsya nābhyān nalinādaham āsaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: yadā asya nābhyāt nalināt aham āsam mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.022/3 nāvidaṃ yajñasambhārān puruṣāvayavān ṛte
analyzed: na avidam yajña sambhārān puruṣa avayavān ṛte

original: BhP_02.06.023/1 teṣu yajñasya paśavaḥ savanaspatayaḥ kuśāḥ
analyzed: teṣu yajñasya paśavaḥ sa vanaspatayaḥ kuśāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.023/3 idaṃ ca devayajanaṃ kālaścoruguṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: idam ca deva yajanam kālaḥ ca uru guṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.024/1 vastūnyoṣadhayaḥ snehā rasalohamṛdo jalam
analyzed: vastūni oṣadhayaḥ snehāḥ rasa loha mṛdaḥ jalam

original: BhP_02.06.024/3 ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni cāturhotraṃ ca sattama
analyzed: ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni cāturhotram ca sattama

original: BhP_02.06.025/1 nāmadheyāni mantrāśca dakṣiṇāśca vratāni ca
analyzed: nāmadheyāni mantrāḥ ca dakṣiṇāḥ ca vratāni ca

original: BhP_02.06.025/3 devatānukramaḥ kalpaḥ saṅkalpastantram eva ca
analyzed: devatā anukramaḥ kalpaḥ saṅkalpaḥ tantram eva ca

original: BhP_02.06.026/1 gatayo matayaścaiva prāyaścittaṃ samarpaṇam
analyzed: gatayaḥ matayaḥ ca eva prāyaścittam samarpaṇam

original: BhP_02.06.026/3 puruṣāvayavairete sambhārāḥ sambhṛtā mayā
analyzed: puruṣa avayavaiḥ ete sambhārāḥ sambhṛtāḥ mayā

original: BhP_02.06.027/1 iti sambhṛtasambhāraḥ puruṣāvayavairaham
analyzed: iti sambhṛta sambhāraḥ puruṣa avayavaiḥ aham

original: BhP_02.06.027/3 tam eva puruṣaṃ yajñaṃ tenaivāyajam īśvaram
analyzed: tam eva puruṣam yajñam tena eva ayajam īśvaram

original: BhP_02.06.028/1 tataste bhrātara ime prajānāṃ patayo nava
analyzed: tatas te bhrātaraḥ ime prajānām patayaḥ nava

original: BhP_02.06.028/3 ayajan vyaktam avyaktaṃ puruṣaṃ susamāhitāḥ
analyzed: ayajan vyaktam avyaktam puruṣam su samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.029/1 tataśca manavaḥ kāle ījire ṛṣayo 'pare
analyzed: tatas ca manavaḥ kāle ījire ṛṣayaḥ pare

original: BhP_02.06.029/3 pitaro vibudhā daityā manuṣyāḥ kratubhirvibhum
analyzed: pitaraḥ vibudhāḥ daityāḥ manuṣyāḥ kratubhiḥ vibhum

original: BhP_02.06.030/1 nārāyaṇe bhagavati tadidaṃ viśvam āhitam
analyzed: nārāyaṇe bhagavati tat idam viśvam āhitam

original: BhP_02.06.030/3 gṛhītamāyoruguṇaḥ sargādāvaguṇaḥ svataḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta māyā uru guṇaḥ sarga ādau aguṇaḥ svatas

original: BhP_02.06.031/1 sṛjāmi tanniyukto 'haṃ haro harati tadvaśaḥ
analyzed: sṛjāmi tad niyuktaḥ ham haraḥ harati tad vaśaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.031/3 viśvaṃ puruṣarūpeṇa paripāti triśaktidhṛk
analyzed: viśvam puruṣa rūpeṇa paripāti tri śakti dhṛk

original: BhP_02.06.032/1 iti te 'bhihitaṃ tāta yathedam anupṛcchasi
analyzed: iti te bhihitam tāta yathā idam anupṛcchasi

original: BhP_02.06.032/3 nānyadbhagavataḥ kiñcidbhāvyaṃ sadasadātmakam
analyzed: na anyat bhagavataḥ kiñcid bhāvyam sat asat ātmakam

original: BhP_02.06.033/1 na bhāratī me 'ṅga mṛṣopalakṣyate na vai kvacin me manaso mṛṣā gatiḥ
analyzed: na bhāratī me ṅga mṛṣā upalakṣyate na vai kvacid me manasaḥ mṛṣā gatiḥ

original: BhP_02.06.033/3 na me hṛṣīkāṇi patantyasatpathe yan me hṛdautkaṇṭhyavatā dhṛto hariḥ
analyzed: na me hṛṣīkāṇi patanti asat pathe yat me hṛdā autkaṇṭhyavatā dhṛtaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_02.06.034/1 so 'haṃ samāmnāyamayastapomayaḥ prajāpatīnām abhivanditaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham samāmnāya mayaḥ tapaḥ mayaḥ prajāpatīnām abhivanditaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_02.06.034/3 āsthāya yogaṃ nipuṇaṃ samāhitastaṃ nādhyagacchaṃ yata ātmasambhavaḥ
analyzed: āsthāya yogam nipuṇam samāhitaḥ tam na adhyagaccham yatas ātma sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.035/1 nato 'smyahaṃ taccaraṇaṃ samīyuṣāṃ bhavacchidaṃ svastyayanaṃ sumaṅgalam
analyzed: nataḥ smi aham tad caraṇam samīyuṣām bhavat chidam svastyayanam su maṅgalam

original: BhP_02.06.035/3 yo hyātmamāyāvibhavaṃ sma paryagād yathā nabhaḥ svāntam athāpare kutaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hi ātma māyā vibhavam sma paryagāt yathā nabhaḥ sva antam atha apare kutas

original: BhP_02.06.036/1 nāhaṃ na yūyaṃ yadṛtāṃ gatiṃ vidur na vāmadevaḥ kim utāpare surāḥ
analyzed: na aham na yūyam yat ṛtām gatim viduḥ na vāmadevaḥ kim uta apare surāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.036/3 tanmāyayā mohitabuddhayastvidaṃ vinirmitaṃ cātmasamaṃ vicakṣmahe
analyzed: tad māyayā mohita buddhayaḥ tu idam vinirmitam ca ātma samam vicakṣmahe

original: BhP_02.06.037/1 yasyāvatārakarmāṇi gāyanti hyasmadādayaḥ
analyzed: yasya avatāra karmāṇi gāyanti hi asmad ādayaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.037/3 na yaṃ vidanti tattvena tasmai bhagavate namaḥ
analyzed: na yam vidanti tattvena tasmai bhagavate namaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.038/1 sa eṣa ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ kalpe kalpe sṛjatyajaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ kalpe kalpe sṛjati ajaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.038/3 ātmātmanyātmanātmānaṃ sa saṃyacchati pāti ca
analyzed: ātma ātmani ātmanā ātmānam sa saṃyacchati pāti ca

original: BhP_02.06.039/1 viśuddhaṃ kevalaṃ jñānaṃ pratyak samyag avasthitam
analyzed: viśuddham kevalam jñānam pratyak samyak avasthitam

original: BhP_02.06.039/3 satyaṃ pūrṇam anādyantaṃ nirguṇaṃ nityam advayam
analyzed: satyam pūrṇam anādi antam nirguṇam nityam advayam

original: BhP_02.06.040/1 ṛṣe vidanti munayaḥ praśāntātmendriyāśayāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣe vidanti munayaḥ praśānta ātma indriya āśayāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.040/3 yadā tadevāsattarkaistirodhīyeta viplutam
analyzed: yadā tat eva asat tarkaiḥ tirodhīyeta viplutam

original: BhP_02.06.041/1 ādyo 'vatāraḥ puruṣaḥ parasya kālaḥ svabhāvaḥ sadasanmanaśca
analyzed: ādyaḥ vatāraḥ puruṣaḥ parasya kālaḥ svabhāvaḥ sat asat manaḥ ca

original: BhP_02.06.041/3 dravyaṃ vikāro guṇa indriyāṇi virāṭ svarāṭ sthāsnu cariṣṇu bhūmnaḥ
analyzed: dravyam vikāraḥ guṇaḥ indriyāṇi virāj svarāj sthāsnu cariṣṇu bhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.042/1 ahaṃ bhavo yajña ime prajeśā dakṣādayo ye bhavadādayaśca
analyzed: aham bhavaḥ yajñaḥ ime prajā īśāḥ dakṣa ādayaḥ ye bhavat ādayaḥ ca

original: BhP_02.06.042/3 svarlokapālāḥ khagalokapālā nṛlokapālāstalalokapālāḥ
analyzed: svar lokapālāḥ khaga lokapālāḥ nṛ lokapālāḥ tala lokapālāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.043/1 gandharvavidyādharacāraṇeśā ye yakṣarakṣoraganāganāthāḥ
analyzed: gandharva vidyādhara cāraṇa īśāḥ ye yakṣa rakṣa uraga nāga nāthāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.043/3 ye vā ṛṣīṇām ṛṣabhāḥ pitṇāṃ daityendrasiddheśvaradānavendrāḥ
analyzed: ye vai ṛṣīṇām ṛṣabhāḥ pitṇām daitya indra siddha īśvara dānava indrāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.043/5 anye ca ye pretapiśācabhūta kūṣmāṇḍayādomṛgapakṣyadhīśāḥ
analyzed: anye ca ye kūṣmāṇḍa yādaḥ mṛga pakṣi adhīśāḥ

original: BhP_02.06.044/1 yat kiñca loke bhagavan mahasvad ojaḥsahasvadbalavat kṣamāvat
analyzed: yat kiñca loke bhagavat mahasvat ojaḥ sahasvat balavat kṣamāvat

original: BhP_02.06.044/3 śrīhrīvibhūtyātmavadadbhutārṇaṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ rūpavadasvarūpam
analyzed: śrī hrī vibhūti ātmavat adbhuta arṇam tattvam param rūpavat asvarūpam

original: BhP_02.06.045/1 prādhānyato yān ṛṣa āmananti līlāvatārān puruṣasya bhūmnaḥ
analyzed: prādhānyataḥ yān ṛṣe āmananti līlāvatārān puruṣasya bhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_02.06.045/3 āpīyatāṃ karṇakaṣāyaśoṣān anukramiṣye ta imān supeśān
analyzed: āpīyatām karṇa kaṣāya śoṣān anukramiṣye te imān supeśān

original: BhP_02.07.001/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_02.07.001/1 yatrodyataḥ kṣititaloddharaṇāya bibhrat
analyzed: yatra udyataḥ kṣiti tala uddharaṇāya bibhrat

original: BhP_02.07.001/2 krauḍīṃ tanuṃ sakalayajñamayīm anantaḥ
analyzed: krauḍīm tanum sakala yajña mayīm anantaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.001/3 antarmahārṇava upāgatam ādidaityaṃ
analyzed: antar mahā arṇave upāgatam ādidaityam

original: BhP_02.07.001/4 taṃ daṃṣṭrayādrim iva vajradharo dadāra
analyzed: tam daṃṣṭrayā adrim iva vajradharaḥ dadāra

original: BhP_02.07.002/1 jāto rucerajanayat suyamān suyajña
analyzed: jātaḥ ruceḥ ajanayat su yamān su yajña

original: BhP_02.07.002/2 ākūtisūnuramarān atha dakṣiṇāyām
analyzed: ākūti sūnuḥ amarān atha dakṣiṇāyām

original: BhP_02.07.002/3 lokatrayasya mahatīm aharadyadārtiṃ
analyzed: lokatrayasya mahatīm aharat yat ārtim

original: BhP_02.07.002/4 svāyambhuvena manunā harirityanūktaḥ
analyzed: svāyambhuvena manunā hariḥ iti anūktaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.003/1 jajñe ca kardamagṛhe dvija devahūtyāṃ
analyzed: jajñe ca kardamagṛhe dvija devahūtyām

original: BhP_02.07.003/2 strībhiḥ samaṃ navabhirātmagatiṃ svamātre
analyzed: strībhiḥ samam navabhiḥ ātma gatim sva mātre

original: BhP_02.07.003/3 ūce yayātmaśamalaṃ guṇasaṅgapaṅkam
analyzed: ūce yayā ātma śamalam guṇa saṅga paṅkam

original: BhP_02.07.003/4 asmin vidhūya kapilasya gatiṃ prapede
analyzed: asmin vidhūya kapilasya gatim prapede

original: BhP_02.07.004/1 atrerapatyam abhikāṅkṣata āha tuṣṭo
analyzed: atreḥ apatyam abhikāṅkṣataḥ āha tuṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.004/2 datto mayāham iti yadbhagavān sa dattaḥ
analyzed: dattaḥ mayā aham iti yat bhagavān sa dattaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.004/3 yatpādapaṅkajaparāgapavitradehā
analyzed: yad pāda paṅkaja parāga pavitra dehā

original: BhP_02.07.004/4 yogarddhim āpurubhayīṃ yaduhaihayādyāḥ
analyzed: yoga ṛddhim āpuḥ ubhayīm yadu haihaya ādyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.005/1 taptaṃ tapo vividhalokasisṛkṣayā me
analyzed: taptam tapaḥ vividha loka sisṛkṣayā me

original: BhP_02.07.005/2 ādau sanāt svatapasaḥ sa catuḥsano 'bhūt
analyzed: ādau sanāt sva tapasaḥ sa catuḥsanaḥ bhūt

original: BhP_02.07.005/3 prākkalpasamplavavinaṣṭam ihātmatattvaṃ
analyzed: prākkalpa samplava vinaṣṭam iha ātma tattvam

original: BhP_02.07.005/4 samyag jagāda munayo yadacakṣatātman
analyzed: samyak jagāda munayaḥ yat acakṣata ātman

original: BhP_02.07.006/1 dharmasya dakṣaduhitaryajaniṣṭa mūrtyāṃ
analyzed: dharmasya dakṣa duhitari ajaniṣṭa mūrtyām

original: BhP_02.07.006/2 nārāyaṇo nara iti svatapaḥprabhāvaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ naraḥ iti sva tapaḥ prabhāvaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.006/3 dṛṣṭvātmano bhagavato niyamāvalopaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ātmanaḥ bhagavataḥ niyama avalopam

original: BhP_02.07.006/4 devyastvanaṅgapṛtanā ghaṭituṃ na śekuḥ
analyzed: devyaḥ tu anaṅga pṛtanāḥ ghaṭitum na śekuḥ

original: BhP_02.07.007/1 kāmaṃ dahanti kṛtino nanu roṣadṛṣṭyā
analyzed: kāmam dahanti kṛtinaḥ nanu roṣa dṛṣṭyā

original: BhP_02.07.007/2 roṣaṃ dahantam uta te na dahantyasahyam
analyzed: roṣam dahantam uta te na dahanti asahyam

original: BhP_02.07.007/3 so 'yaṃ yadantaram alaṃ praviśan bibheti
analyzed: saḥ yam yad antaram alam praviśan bibheti

original: BhP_02.07.007/4 kāmaḥ kathaṃ nu punarasya manaḥ śrayeta
analyzed: kāmaḥ katham nu punar asya manaḥ śrayeta

original: BhP_02.07.008/1 viddhaḥ sapatnyuditapatribhiranti rājño
analyzed: viddhaḥ sapatnī udita patribhiḥ anti rājñaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.008/2 bālo 'pi sann upagatastapase vanāni
analyzed: bālaḥ pi san upagataḥ tapase vanāni

original: BhP_02.07.008/3 tasmā adāddhruvagatiṃ gṛṇate prasanno
analyzed: tasmai adāt dhruva gatim gṛṇate prasannaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.008/4 divyāḥ stuvanti munayo yaduparyadhastāt
analyzed: divyāḥ stuvanti munayaḥ yat upari adhastāt

original: BhP_02.07.009/1 yadvenam utpathagataṃ dvijavākyavajra
analyzed: yat venam utpatha gatam dvija vākya vajra

original: BhP_02.07.009/2 niṣpluṣṭapauruṣabhagaṃ niraye patantam
analyzed: niṣpluṣṭa pauruṣa bhagam niraye patantam

original: BhP_02.07.009/3 trātvārthito jagati putrapadaṃ ca lebhe
analyzed: trātvā arthitaḥ jagati putra padam ca lebhe

original: BhP_02.07.009/4 dugdhā vasūni vasudhā sakalāni yena
analyzed: dugdhā vasūni vasudhā sakalāni yena

original: BhP_02.07.010/1 nābherasāvṛṣabha āsa sudevisūnur
analyzed: nābheḥ asau ṛṣabhaḥ āsa sudevi sūnuḥ

original: BhP_02.07.010/2 yo vai cacāra samadṛg jaḍayogacaryām
analyzed: yaḥ vai cacāra samadṛś jaḍa yoga caryām

original: BhP_02.07.010/3 yat pāramahaṃsyam ṛṣayaḥ padam āmananti
analyzed: yat pāramahaṃsyam ṛṣayaḥ padam āmananti

original: BhP_02.07.010/4 svasthaḥ praśāntakaraṇaḥ parimuktasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: svasthaḥ praśānta karaṇaḥ parimukta saṅgaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.011/1 satre mamāsa bhagavān hayaśīraṣātho
analyzed: satre mamāsa bhagavān hayaśīraṣā atho

original: BhP_02.07.011/2 sākṣāt sa yajñapuruṣastapanīyavarṇaḥ
analyzed: sākṣāt sa yajñapuruṣaḥ tapanīya varṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.011/3 chandomayo makhamayo 'khiladevatātmā
BhP_02.07.011/4 vāco babhūvuruśatīḥ śvasato 'sya nastaḥ
analyzed: vācaḥ babhūvuḥ uśatīḥ śvasataḥ sya nastas

original: BhP_02.07.012/1 matsyo yugāntasamaye manunopalabdhaḥ
analyzed: matsyaḥ yugānta samaye manunā upalabdhaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.012/2 kṣoṇīmayo nikhilajīvanikāyaketaḥ
BhP_02.07.012/3 visraṃsitān urubhaye salile mukhān me
analyzed: visraṃsitān uru bhaye salile mukhāt me

original: BhP_02.07.012/4 ādāya tatra vijahāra ha vedamārgān
analyzed: ādāya tatra vijahāra ha veda mārgān

original: BhP_02.07.013/1 kṣīrodadhāvamaradānavayūthapānām
analyzed: kṣīrodadhau amara dānava yūthapānām

original: BhP_02.07.013/2 unmathnatām amṛtalabdhaya ādidevaḥ
analyzed: unmathnatām amṛta labdhaye ādidevaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.013/3 pṛṣṭhena kacchapavapurvidadhāra gotraṃ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhena kacchapa vapuḥ vidadhāra gotram

original: BhP_02.07.013/4 nidrākṣaṇo 'driparivartakaṣāṇakaṇḍūḥ
analyzed: nidrā akṣaṇaḥ dri parivarta kaṣāṇa kaṇḍūḥ

original: BhP_02.07.014/1 traipiṣṭaporubhayahā sa nṛsiṃharūpaṃ
analyzed: sa nṛsiṃha rūpam

original: BhP_02.07.014/2 kṛtvā bhramadbhrukuṭidaṃṣṭrakarālavaktram
analyzed: kṛtvā bhramat bhrukuṭi daṃṣṭra karāla vaktram

original: BhP_02.07.014/3 daityendram āśu gadayābhipatantam ārād
analyzed: daitya indram āśu gadayā abhipatantam ārāt

original: BhP_02.07.014/4 ūrau nipātya vidadāra nakhaiḥ sphurantam
analyzed: ūrau nipātya vidadāra nakhaiḥ sphurantam

original: BhP_02.07.015/1 antaḥsarasyurubalena pade gṛhīto
analyzed: antar sarasi uru balena pade

original: BhP_02.07.015/2 grāheṇa yūthapatirambujahasta ārtaḥ
analyzed: grāheṇa yūtha patiḥ ambuja hastaḥ ārtaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.015/3 āhedam ādipuruṣākhilalokanātha
analyzed: āha idam ādipuruṣa akhila lokanātha

original: BhP_02.07.015/4 tīrthaśravaḥ śravaṇamaṅgalanāmadheya
analyzed: tīrtha śravaḥ śravaṇa maṅgala nāmadheya

original: BhP_02.07.016/1 śrutvā haristam araṇārthinam aprameyaś
analyzed: śrutvā hariḥ tam araṇa arthinam aprameyaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.016/2 cakrāyudhaḥ patagarājabhujādhirūḍhaḥ
analyzed: cakrāyudhaḥ pataga rāja bhuja adhirūḍhaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.016/3 cakreṇa nakravadanaṃ vinipāṭya tasmād
analyzed: cakreṇa nakra vadanam vinipāṭya tasmāt

original: BhP_02.07.016/4 dhaste pragṛhya bhagavān kṛpayojjahāra
analyzed: dhaste pragṛhya bhagavān kṛpayā ujjahāra

original: BhP_02.07.017/1 jyāyān guṇairavarajo 'pyaditeḥ sutānāṃ
analyzed: jyāyān guṇaiḥ avarajaḥ pi aditeḥ sutānām

original: BhP_02.07.017/2 lokān vicakrama imān yadathādhiyajñaḥ
analyzed: lokān vicakrame imān yat atha adhiyajñaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.017/3 kṣmāṃ vāmanena jagṛhe tripadacchalena
analyzed: kṣmām vāmanena jagṛhe tripada chalena

original: BhP_02.07.017/4 yācñām ṛte pathi caran prabhubhirna cālyaḥ
analyzed: yācñām ṛte pathi caran prabhubhiḥ na cālyaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.018/1 nārtho balerayam urukramapādaśaucam
analyzed: na arthaḥ baleḥ ayam urukrama pāda śaucam

original: BhP_02.07.018/2 āpaḥ śikhādhṛtavato vibudhādhipatyam
analyzed: āpaḥ śikhā dhṛtavataḥ vibudha ādhipatyam

original: BhP_02.07.018/3 yo vai pratiśrutam ṛte na cikīrṣadanyad
analyzed: yaḥ vai pratiśrutam ṛte na cikīrṣat anyat

original: BhP_02.07.018/4 ātmānam aṅga manasā haraye 'bhimene
analyzed: ātmānam aṅga manasā haraye bhimene

original: BhP_02.07.019/1 tubhyaṃ ca nārada bhṛśaṃ bhagavān vivṛddha
analyzed: tubhyam ca nārada bhṛśam bhagavān vivṛddha

original: BhP_02.07.019/2 bhāvena sādhu parituṣṭa uvāca yogam
analyzed: bhāvena sādhu parituṣṭaḥ uvāca yogam

original: BhP_02.07.019/3 jñānaṃ ca bhāgavatam ātmasatattvadīpaṃ
analyzed: jñānam ca bhāgavatam ātma sa tattva dīpam

original: BhP_02.07.019/4 yadvāsudevaśaraṇā vidurañjasaiva
analyzed: yat vāsudeva śaraṇāḥ viduḥ añjasā eva

original: BhP_02.07.020/1 cakraṃ ca dikṣvavihataṃ daśasu svatejo
analyzed: cakram ca dikṣu avihatam daśasu sva tejaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.020/2 manvantareṣu manuvaṃśadharo bibharti
analyzed: manvantareṣu manu vaṃśa dharaḥ bibharti

original: BhP_02.07.020/3 duṣṭeṣu rājasu damaṃ vyadadhāt svakīrtiṃ
analyzed: duṣṭeṣu rājasu damam vyadadhāt sva kīrtim

original: BhP_02.07.020/4 satye tripṛṣṭha uśatīṃ prathayaṃścaritraiḥ
analyzed: satye tri pṛṣṭhe uśatīm prathayan caritraiḥ

original: BhP_02.07.021/1 dhanvantariśca bhagavān svayam eva kīrtir
analyzed: dhanvantariḥ ca bhagavān svayam eva kīrtiḥ

original: BhP_02.07.021/2 nāmnā nṛṇāṃ pururujāṃ ruja āśu hanti
analyzed: nāmnā nṛṇām puru rujām rujaḥ āśu hanti

original: BhP_02.07.021/3 yajñe ca bhāgam amṛtāyuravāvarundha
analyzed: yajñe ca bhāgam amṛta āyuḥ avāvarundha

original: BhP_02.07.021/4 āyuṣyavedam anuśāstyavatīrya loke
analyzed: āyuṣya vedam anuśāsti avatīrya loke

original: BhP_02.07.022/1 kṣatraṃ kṣayāya vidhinopabhṛtaṃ mahātmā
analyzed: kṣatram kṣayāya vidhinā upabhṛtam mahātmā

original: BhP_02.07.022/2 brahmadhrug ujjhitapathaṃ narakārtilipsu
analyzed: ujjhita patham naraka ārti lipsu

original: BhP_02.07.022/3 uddhantyasāvavanikaṇṭakam ugravīryas

original: BhP_02.07.022/4 triḥsaptakṛtva urudhāraparaśvadhena
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas uru dhāra paraśvadhena

original: BhP_02.07.023/1 asmatprasādasumukhaḥ kalayā kaleśa

original: BhP_02.07.023/2 ikṣvākuvaṃśa avatīrya gurornideśe
analyzed: ikṣvāku vaṃśe avatīrya guroḥ nideśe

original: BhP_02.07.023/3 tiṣṭhan vanaṃ sadayitānuja āviveśa
analyzed: tiṣṭhan vanam sa dayita anujaḥ āviveśa

original: BhP_02.07.023/4 yasmin virudhya daśakandhara ārtim ārcchat
analyzed: yasmin virudhya daśakandharaḥ ārtim ārcchat

original: BhP_02.07.024/1 yasmā adādudadhirūḍhabhayāṅgavepo
analyzed: yasmai adāt udadhi rūḍha bhaya aṅga vepaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.024/2 mārgaṃ sapadyaripuraṃ haravaddidhakṣoḥ
analyzed: mārgam sa padi ari puram hara vat didhakṣoḥ

original: BhP_02.07.024/3 dūre suhṛnmathitaroṣasuśoṇadṛṣṭyā
analyzed: dūre suhṛd mathita roṣa su śoṇa dṛṣṭyā

original: BhP_02.07.024/4 tātapyamānamakaroraganakracakraḥ
analyzed: tātapyamāna makara uraga nakra cakraḥ

original: BhP_02.07.025/1 vakṣaḥsthalasparśarugnamahendravāha
BhP_02.07.025/2 dantairviḍambitakakubjuṣa ūḍhahāsam
analyzed: dantaiḥ viḍambita kakubh juṣaḥ ūḍha hāsam

original: BhP_02.07.025/3 sadyo 'subhiḥ saha vineṣyati dārahartur
analyzed: sadyas subhiḥ saha vineṣyati dārahartuḥ

original: BhP_02.07.025/4 visphūrjitairdhanuṣa uccarato 'dhisainye
analyzed: visphūrjitaiḥ dhanuṣaḥ uccarataḥ dhi sainye

original: BhP_02.07.026/1 bhūmeḥ suretaravarūthavimarditāyāḥ
analyzed: bhūmeḥ suretara varūtha vimarditāyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.026/2 kleśavyayāya kalayā sitakṛṣṇakeśaḥ
analyzed: kleśa vyayāya kalayā sita kṛṣṇa keśaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.026/3 jātaḥ kariṣyati janānupalakṣyamārgaḥ
analyzed: jātaḥ kariṣyati jana anupalakṣya mārgaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.026/4 karmāṇi cātmamahimopanibandhanāni
analyzed: karmāṇi ca ātma mahima upanibandhanāni

original: BhP_02.07.027/1 tokena jīvaharaṇaṃ yadulūkikāyās
analyzed: tokena jīva haraṇam yat ulūkikāyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.027/2 traimāsikasya ca padā śakaṭo 'pavṛttaḥ
analyzed: traimāsikasya ca padā śakaṭaḥ upavṛttaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.027/3 yadriṅgatāntaragatena divispṛśorvā
analyzed: yat riṅgatā antara gatena divispṛśoḥ vā

original: BhP_02.07.027/4 unmūlanaṃ tvitarathārjunayorna bhāvyam
analyzed: unmūlanam tu itarathā arjunayoḥ na bhāvyam

original: BhP_02.07.028/1 yadvai vraje vrajapaśūn viṣatoyapītān
analyzed: yat vai vraje vraja paśūn viṣa toya pītān

original: BhP_02.07.028/2 pālāṃstvajīvayadanugrahadṛṣṭivṛṣṭyā
analyzed: pālān tu ajīvayat anugraha dṛṣṭi vṛṣṭyā

original: BhP_02.07.028/3 tacchuddhaye 'tiviṣavīryavilolajihvam
analyzed: tad śuddhaye tiviṣa vīrya vilola jihvam

original: BhP_02.07.028/4 uccāṭayiṣyaduragaṃ viharan hradinyām
analyzed: uccāṭayiṣyat uragam viharan hradinyām

original: BhP_02.07.029/1 tat karma divyam iva yan niśi niḥśayānaṃ
analyzed: tat karma divyam iva yat niśi niḥśayānam

original: BhP_02.07.029/2 dāvāgninā śucivane paridahyamāne
analyzed: dāva agninā śuci vane paridahyamāne

original: BhP_02.07.029/3 unneṣyati vrajam ato 'vasitāntakālaṃ
analyzed: unneṣyati vrajam atas vasita anta kālam

original: BhP_02.07.029/4 netre pidhāpya sabalo 'nadhigamyavīryaḥ
analyzed: netre pidhāpya sa balaḥ na adhigamya vīryaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.030/1 gṛhṇīta yadyadupabandham amuṣya mātā
analyzed: gṛhṇīta yat yat upabandham amuṣya mātā

original: BhP_02.07.030/2 śulbaṃ sutasya na tu tat tadamuṣya māti
analyzed: śulbam sutasya na tu tat tat amuṣya mā ati

original: BhP_02.07.030/3 yaj jṛmbhato 'sya vadane bhuvanāni gopī
analyzed: yat jṛmbhataḥ u sya vadane bhuvanāni gopī

original: BhP_02.07.030/4 saṃvīkṣya śaṅkitamanāḥ pratibodhitāsīt
analyzed: saṃvīkṣya śaṅkita manāḥ pratibodhitā āsīt

original: BhP_02.07.031/1 nandaṃ ca mokṣyati bhayādvaruṇasya pāśād
analyzed: nandam ca mokṣyati bhayāt varuṇasya pāśāt

original: BhP_02.07.031/2 gopān bileṣu pihitān mayasūnunā ca
analyzed: gopān bileṣu pihitān maya sūnunā ca

original: BhP_02.07.031/3 ahnyāpṛtaṃ niśi śayānam atiśrameṇa
analyzed: ahnyāpṛtam niśi śayānam atiśrameṇa

original: BhP_02.07.031/4 lokaṃ vikuṇṭham upaneṣyati gokulaṃ sma
analyzed: lokam vikuṇṭham upaneṣyati gokulam sma

original: BhP_02.07.032/1 gopairmakhe pratihate vrajaviplavāya
analyzed: gopaiḥ makhe pratihate vraja viplavāya

original: BhP_02.07.032/2 deve 'bhivarṣati paśūn kṛpayā rirakṣuḥ
analyzed: deve bhivarṣati paśūn kṛpayā rirakṣuḥ

original: BhP_02.07.032/3 dhartocchilīndhram iva saptadināni sapta
analyzed: dhartā ucchilīndhram iva sapta dināni sapta

original: BhP_02.07.032/4 varṣo mahīdhram anaghaikakare salīlam
analyzed: varṣaḥ mahīdhram anagha eka kare sa līlam

original: BhP_02.07.033/1 krīḍan vane niśi niśākararaśmigauryāṃ
analyzed: krīḍan vane niśi niśākara raśmi gauryām

original: BhP_02.07.033/2 rāsonmukhaḥ kalapadāyatamūrcchitena
analyzed: rāsa unmukhaḥ kala pada āyata mūrcchitena

original: BhP_02.07.033/3 uddīpitasmararujāṃ vrajabhṛdvadhūnāṃ
analyzed: uddīpita smara rujām vrajabhṛt vadhūnām

original: BhP_02.07.033/4 harturhariṣyati śiro dhanadānugasya
analyzed: hartuḥ hariṣyati śiraḥ dhanada anugasya

original: BhP_02.07.034/1 ye ca pralambakharadardurakeśyariṣṭa
analyzed: ye ca pralamba khara dardura keśi ariṣṭa

original: BhP_02.07.034/2 mallebhakaṃsayavanāḥ kapipauṇḍrakādyāḥ
BhP_02.07.034/3 anye ca śālvakujabalvaladantavakra
analyzed: anye ca

original: BhP_02.07.034/4 saptokṣaśambaravidūratharukmimukhyāḥ
analyzed: sapta ukṣa śambara vidūratha rukmi mukhyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.035/1 ye vā mṛdhe samitiśālina āttacāpāḥ
analyzed: ye vā mṛdhe samiti śālinaḥ ātta cāpāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.035/2 kāmbojamatsyakurusṛñjayakaikayādyāḥ
analyzed: kāmboja matsya kuru sṛñjaya kaikaya ādyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.035/3 yāsyantyadarśanam alaṃ balapārthabhīma
analyzed: yāsyanti adarśanam alam bala pārtha bhīma

original: BhP_02.07.035/4 vyājāhvayena hariṇā nilayaṃ tadīyam
analyzed: vyāja āhvayena hariṇā nilayam tadīyam

original: BhP_02.07.036/1 kālena mīlitadhiyām avamṛśya nṇāṃ
analyzed: kālena mīlita dhiyām avamṛśya

original: BhP_02.07.036/2 stokāyuṣāṃ svanigamo bata dūrapāraḥ
analyzed: stoka āyuṣām sva nigamaḥ bata dūra pāraḥ

original: BhP_02.07.036/3 āvirhitastvanuyugaṃ sa hi satyavatyāṃ
analyzed: āvis hitaḥ tu anuyugam sa hi satyavatyām

original: BhP_02.07.036/4 vedadrumaṃ viṭapaśo vibhajiṣyati sma
analyzed: veda drumam viṭa paśoḥ vibhajiṣyati sma

original: BhP_02.07.037/1 devadviṣāṃ nigamavartmani niṣṭhitānāṃ
analyzed: deva dviṣām nigama vartmani niṣṭhitānām

original: BhP_02.07.037/2 pūrbhirmayena vihitābhiradṛśyatūrbhiḥ
analyzed: pūrbhiḥ mayena vihitābhiḥ adṛśya tūrbhiḥ

original: BhP_02.07.037/3 lokān ghnatāṃ mativimoham atipralobhaṃ
analyzed: lokān ghnatām mati vimoham ati pralobham

original: BhP_02.07.037/4 veṣaṃ vidhāya bahu bhāṣyata aupadharmyam
analyzed: veṣam vidhāya bahu bhāṣyata aupadharmyam

original: BhP_02.07.038/1 yarhyālayeṣvapi satāṃ na hareḥ kathāḥ syuḥ
analyzed: yarhi ālayeṣu api satām na hareḥ kathāḥ syuḥ

original: BhP_02.07.038/2 pāṣaṇḍino dvijajanā vṛṣalā nṛdevāḥ
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍinaḥ dvija janāḥ vṛṣalāḥ nṛdevāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.038/4 śāstā bhaviṣyati kalerbhagavān yugānte
analyzed: śāstā bhaviṣyati kaleḥ bhagavān yuga ante

analyzed: sarge tapaḥ ham ṛṣayaḥ nava ye prajā īśāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.039/2 sthāne 'tha dharmamakhamanvamarāvanīśāḥ
analyzed: sthāne tha

original: BhP_02.07.039/3 ante tvadharmaharamanyuvaśāsurādyā

original: BhP_02.07.039/4 māyāvibhūtaya imāḥ puruśaktibhājaḥ
analyzed: māyā vibhūtayaḥ imāḥ puru śakti bhājaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ pārthivāni api kaviḥ vimame rajāṃsi
