original: BhP_02.07.040/4 yasmāt trisāmyasadanādurukampayānam
analyzed: yasmāt tri sāmya sadanāt urukampayānam

original: BhP_02.07.041/1 nāntaṃ vidāmyaham amī munayo 'grajāste
analyzed: na antam vidāmi aham amī munayaḥ grajāḥ te

original: BhP_02.07.041/2 māyābalasya puruṣasya kuto 'varā ye
analyzed: māyā balasya puruṣasya kutas varāḥ ye

original: BhP_02.07.041/4 śeṣo 'dhunāpi samavasyati nāsya pāram
analyzed: śeṣaḥ dhunā api samavasyati na asya pāram

original: BhP_02.07.042/1 yeṣāṃ sa eṣa bhagavān dayayedanantaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām saḥ eṣa bhagavān dayayā id anantaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.042/2 sarvātmanāśritapado yadi nirvyalīkam
analyzed: sarva ātmanā āśrita padaḥ yadi nirvyalīkam

original: BhP_02.07.042/3 te dustarām atitaranti ca devamāyāṃ
analyzed: te dustarām atitaranti ca deva māyām

original: BhP_02.07.042/4 naiṣāṃ mamāham iti dhīḥ śvaśṛgālabhakṣye
analyzed: na eṣām mama aham iti dhīḥ śva śṛgāla bhakṣye

original: BhP_02.07.043/1 vedāham aṅga paramasya hi yogamāyāṃ
analyzed: veda aham aṅga paramasya hi yoga māyām

original: BhP_02.07.043/2 yūyaṃ bhavaśca bhagavān atha daityavaryaḥ
analyzed: yūyam bhavaḥ ca bhagavān atha daitya varyaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.043/3 patnī manoḥ sa ca manuśca tadātmajāśca
analyzed: patnī manoḥ sa ca manuḥ ca tad ātmajāḥ ca

original: BhP_02.07.043/4 prācīnabarhirṛbhuraṅga uta dhruvaśca
analyzed: prācīnabarhiḥ ṛbhuḥ aṅgaḥ uta dhruvaḥ ca

original: BhP_02.07.044/1 ikṣvākurailamucukundavidehagādhi
analyzed: ikṣvāku raila mucukunda videha gādhi

original: BhP_02.07.044/2 raghvambarīṣasagarā gayanāhuṣādyāḥ
analyzed: raghu ambarīṣa sagarāḥ gaya nāhuṣa ādyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.044/3 māndhātralarkaśatadhanvanurantidevā
analyzed: māndhātṛ alarka śatadhanva nurantidevā

original: BhP_02.07.044/4 devavrato baliramūrttarayo dilīpaḥ
analyzed: devavrataḥ baliḥ amūrtta rayaḥ dilīpaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.045/1 saubharyutaṅkaśibidevalapippalāda
analyzed: saubhari utaṅka śibi devala pippalāda

original: BhP_02.07.045/2 sārasvatoddhavaparāśarabhūriṣeṇāḥ
analyzed: sārasvata uddhava parāśara bhūriṣeṇāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.045/3 ye 'nye vibhīṣaṇahanūmadupendradatta
analyzed: ye nye vibhīṣaṇa hanūmat upendradatta

original: BhP_02.07.045/4 pārthārṣṭiṣeṇaviduraśrutadevavaryāḥ
analyzed: pārtha ārṣṭiṣeṇa vidura śrutadeva varyāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.046/1 te vai vidantyatitaranti ca devamāyāṃ
analyzed: te vai vidanti atitaranti ca deva māyām

original: BhP_02.07.046/2 strīśūdrahūṇaśabarā api pāpajīvāḥ
analyzed: strī śūdra hūṇa śabarāḥ api pāpa jīvāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.046/3 yadyadbhutakramaparāyaṇaśīlaśikṣās
analyzed: yad yadbhuta krama parāyaṇa śīla śikṣāḥ

original: BhP_02.07.046/4 tiryagjanā api kim u śrutadhāraṇā ye
analyzed: tiryagjanāḥ api kim u śruta dhāraṇāḥ ye

original: BhP_02.07.047/1 śaśvat praśāntam abhayaṃ pratibodhamātraṃ
analyzed: śaśvat praśāntam abhayam pratibodha mātram

original: BhP_02.07.047/2 śuddhaṃ samaṃ sadasataḥ paramātmatattvam
analyzed: śuddham samam sat asataḥ paramātma tattvam

original: BhP_02.07.047/3 śabdo na yatra purukārakavān kriyārtho
analyzed: śabdaḥ na yatra puru kārakavān

original: BhP_02.07.047/4 māyā paraityabhimukhe ca vilajjamānā
analyzed: māyā paraiti abhimukhe ca vilajjamānā

original: BhP_02.07.048/1 tadvai padaṃ bhagavataḥ paramasya puṃso
analyzed: tat vai padam bhagavataḥ paramasya puṃsaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.048/2 brahmeti yadvidurajasrasukhaṃ viśokam
analyzed: brahma iti yat viduḥ ajasra sukham viśokam

original: BhP_02.07.048/3 sadhryaṅ niyamya yatayo yamakartahetiṃ
analyzed: sadhryak niyamya yatayaḥ yama karta hetim

original: BhP_02.07.048/4 jahyuḥ svarāḍiva nipānakhanitram indraḥ
analyzed: jahyuḥ svarāj iva nipāna khanitram indraḥ

original: BhP_02.07.049/1 sa śreyasām api vibhurbhagavān yato 'sya
analyzed: sa śreyasām api vibhuḥ bhagavān yatas sya

original: BhP_02.07.049/2 bhāvasvabhāvavihitasya sataḥ prasiddhiḥ
analyzed: bhāva svabhāva vihitasya sataḥ prasiddhiḥ

original: BhP_02.07.049/3 dehe svadhātuvigame 'nuviśīryamāṇe
analyzed: dehe sva dhātu vigame

original: BhP_02.07.049/4 vyomeva tatra puruṣo na viśīryate ñjaḥ
analyzed: vyoma iva tatra puruṣaḥ na viśīryate ñjas

original: BhP_02.07.050/1 so 'yaṃ te 'bhihitastāta bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam te bhihitaḥ tāta bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_02.07.050/3 samāsena harernānyadanyasmāt sadasac ca yat
analyzed: samāsena hareḥ na anyat anyasmāt sat asat ca yat

original: BhP_02.07.051/1 idaṃ bhāgavataṃ nāma yan me bhagavatoditam
analyzed: idam bhāgavatam nāma yat me bhagavatā uditam

original: BhP_02.07.051/3 saṅgraho 'yaṃ vibhūtīnāṃ tvam etadvipulī kuru
analyzed: saṅgrahaḥ yam vibhūtīnām tvam etad vipulī kuru

original: BhP_02.07.052/1 yathā harau bhagavati nṛṇāṃ bhaktirbhaviṣyati
analyzed: yathā harau bhagavati nṛṇām bhaktiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_02.07.052/3 sarvātmanyakhilādhāre iti saṅkalpya varṇaya
analyzed: sarva ātmani akhila ādhāre iti saṅkalpya varṇaya

original: BhP_02.07.053/1 māyāṃ varṇayato 'muṣya īśvarasyānumodataḥ
analyzed: māyām varṇayataḥ muṣye īśvarasya anumodataḥ

original: BhP_02.07.053/3 śṛṇvataḥ śraddhayā nityaṃ māyayātmā na muhyati
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ śraddhayā nityam māyayā ātmā na muhyati

original: BhP_02.08.001/0 rājovāca
analyzed: rājā uvāca

original: BhP_02.08.001/1 brahmaṇā codito brahman guṇākhyāne 'guṇasya ca
analyzed: brahmaṇā coditaḥ brahman guṇa ākhyāne guṇasya ca

original: BhP_02.08.001/3 yasmai yasmai yathā prāha nārado devadarśanaḥ
analyzed: yasmai yasmai yathā prāha nāradaḥ devadarśanaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.002/1 etadveditum icchāmi tattvaṃ tattvavidāṃ vara
analyzed: etat veditum icchāmi tattvam tattva vidām vara

original: BhP_02.08.002/3 hareradbhutavīryasya kathā lokasumaṅgalāḥ
analyzed: hareḥ adbhuta vīryasya kathāḥ loka su maṅgalāḥ

original: BhP_02.08.003/1 kathayasva mahābhāga yathāham akhilātmani
analyzed: kathayasva mahābhāga yathā aham akhilātmani

original: BhP_02.08.003/3 kṛṣṇe niveśya niḥsaṅgaṃ manastyakṣye kalevaram
analyzed: kṛṣṇe niveśya niḥsaṅgam manaḥ tyakṣye kalevaram

original: BhP_02.08.004/1 śṛṇvataḥ śraddhayā nityaṃ gṛṇataśca svaceṣṭitam
analyzed: śṛṇvataḥ śraddhayā nityam gṛṇataḥ ca sva ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_02.08.004/3 kālena nātidīrgheṇa bhagavān viśate hṛdi
analyzed: kālena na ati dīrgheṇa bhagavān viśate hṛdi

original: BhP_02.08.005/1 praviṣṭaḥ karṇarandhreṇa svānāṃ bhāvasaroruham
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ karṇa randhreṇa svānām bhāva saroruham

original: BhP_02.08.005/3 dhunoti śamalaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ salilasya yathā śarat
analyzed: dhunoti śamalam kṛṣṇaḥ salilasya yathā śarad

original: BhP_02.08.006/1 dhautātmā puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇa pādamūlaṃ na muñcati
analyzed: dhauta ātmā puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇa pāda mūlam na muñcati

original: BhP_02.08.006/3 muktasarvaparikleśaḥ pānthaḥ svaśaraṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: mukta sarva parikleśaḥ pānthaḥ sva śaraṇam yathā

original: BhP_02.08.007/1 yadadhātumato brahman dehārambho 'sya dhātubhiḥ
analyzed: yat a dhātumataḥ brahman deha ārambhaḥ sya dhātubhiḥ

original: BhP_02.08.007/3 yadṛcchayā hetunā vā bhavanto jānate yathā
analyzed: yadṛcchayā hetunā vā bhavantaḥ jānate yathā

original: BhP_02.08.008/1 āsīdyadudarāt padmaṃ lokasaṃsthānalakṣaṇam
analyzed: āsīt yat udarāt padmam loka saṃsthāna lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_02.08.008/3 yāvān ayaṃ vai puruṣa iyattāvayavaiḥ pṛthak
analyzed: yāvān ayam vai puruṣaḥ iyat tā avayavaiḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_02.08.008/5 tāvān asāviti proktaḥ saṃsthāvayavavān iva
analyzed: tāvān asau iti proktaḥ saṃsthā avayavavān iva

original: BhP_02.08.009/1 ajaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni bhūtātmā yadanugrahāt
analyzed: ajaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni bhūtātmā yat anugrahāt

original: BhP_02.08.009/3 dadṛśe yena tadrūpaṃ nābhipadmasamudbhavaḥ
analyzed: dadṛśe yena tad rūpam nābhi padma samudbhavaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.010/1 sa cāpi yatra puruṣo viśvasthityudbhavāpyayaḥ
analyzed: sa ca api yatra puruṣaḥ viśva sthiti udbhava apyayaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.010/3 muktvātmamāyāṃ māyeśaḥ śete sarvaguhāśayaḥ
analyzed: muktvā ātma māyām māyā īśaḥ śete sarva guhā āśayaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.011/1 puruṣāvayavairlokāḥ sapālāḥ pūrvakalpitāḥ
analyzed: puruṣa avayavaiḥ lokāḥ sa pālāḥ pūrva kalpitāḥ

original: BhP_02.08.011/3 lokairamuṣyāvayavāḥ sapālairiti śuśruma
analyzed: lokaiḥ amuṣya avayavāḥ sa pālaiḥ iti śuśruma

original: BhP_02.08.012/1 yāvān kalpo vikalpo vā yathā kālo 'numīyate
analyzed: yāvān kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ vā yathā kālaḥ numīyate

original: BhP_02.08.012/3 bhūtabhavyabhavacchabda āyurmānaṃ ca yat sataḥ
analyzed: bhūta bhavya bhavat śabdaḥ āyuḥ mānam ca yat sataḥ

original: BhP_02.08.013/1 kālasyānugatiryā tu lakṣyate 'ṇvī bṛhatyapi
analyzed: kālasya anugatiḥ yā tu lakṣyate ṇvī bṛhatī api

original: BhP_02.08.013/3 yāvatyaḥ karmagatayo yādṛśīrdvijasattama
analyzed: yāvatyaḥ karma gatayaḥ yādṛśīḥ dvijasattama

original: BhP_02.08.014/1 yasmin karmasamāvāyo yathā yenopagṛhyate
analyzed: yasmin karma samāvāyaḥ yathā yena upagṛhyate

original: BhP_02.08.014/3 guṇānāṃ guṇināṃ caiva pariṇāmam abhīpsatām
analyzed: guṇānām guṇinām ca eva pariṇāmam abhīpsatām

original: BhP_02.08.015/1 bhūpātālakakubvyoma grahanakṣatrabhūbhṛtām
analyzed: bhū pātāla kakubh vyoma graha nakṣatra bhūbhṛtām

original: BhP_02.08.015/3 saritsamudradvīpānāṃ sambhavaścaitadokasām
analyzed: sarit samudra dvīpānām sambhavaḥ ca etat okasām

original: BhP_02.08.016/1 pramāṇam aṇḍakośasya bāhyābhyantarabhedataḥ
analyzed: pramāṇam aṇḍa kośasya bāhya abhyantara bhedataḥ

original: BhP_02.08.016/3 mahatāṃ cānucaritaṃ varṇāśramaviniścayaḥ
analyzed: mahatām ca anucaritam varṇa āśrama viniścayaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.017/1 yugāni yugamānaṃ ca dharmo yaśca yuge yuge
analyzed: yugāni yuga mānam ca dharmaḥ yaḥ ca yuge yuge

original: BhP_02.08.017/3 avatārānucaritaṃ yadāścaryatamaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: avatāra anucaritam yat āścaryatamam hareḥ

original: BhP_02.08.018/1 nṛṇāṃ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ saviśeṣaśca yādṛśaḥ
analyzed: nṛṇām sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ sa viśeṣaḥ ca yādṛśaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.018/3 śreṇīnāṃ rājarṣīṇāṃ ca dharmaḥ kṛcchreṣu jīvatām
analyzed: śreṇīnām rājarṣīṇām ca dharmaḥ kṛcchreṣu jīvatām

original: BhP_02.08.019/1 tattvānāṃ parisaṅkhyānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hetulakṣaṇam
analyzed: tattvānām parisaṅkhyānam lakṣaṇam hetu lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_02.08.019/3 puruṣārādhanavidhiryogasyādhyātmikasya ca
analyzed: puruṣa ārādhana vidhiḥ yogasya ādhyātmikasya ca

original: BhP_02.08.020/1 yogeśvaraiśvaryagatirliṅgabhaṅgastu yoginām
analyzed: yoga īśvara aiśvarya gatiḥ liṅga bhaṅgaḥ tu yoginām

original: BhP_02.08.020/3 vedopavedadharmāṇām itihāsapurāṇayoḥ
analyzed: veda upaveda dharmāṇām itihāsa purāṇayoḥ

original: BhP_02.08.021/1 samplavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vikramaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ
analyzed: samplavaḥ sarva bhūtānām vikramaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.021/3 iṣṭāpūrtasya kāmyānāṃ trivargasya ca yo vidhiḥ
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrtasya kāmyānām trivargasya ca yaḥ vidhiḥ

original: BhP_02.08.022/1 yo vānuśāyināṃ sargaḥ pāṣaṇḍasya ca sambhavaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vā anuśāyinām sargaḥ pāṣaṇḍasya ca sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_02.08.022/3 ātmano bandhamokṣau ca vyavasthānaṃ svarūpataḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ bandha mokṣau ca vyavasthānam svarūpataḥ

original: BhP_02.08.023/1 yathātmatantro bhagavān vikrīḍatyātmamāyayā
analyzed: yathā ātmatantraḥ bhagavān vikrīḍati ātma māyayā

original: BhP_02.08.023/3 visṛjya vā yathā māyām udāste sākṣivadvibhuḥ
analyzed: visṛjya vā yathā māyām udāste sākṣi vat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_02.08.024/1 sarvam etac ca bhagavan pṛcchato me 'nupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: sarvam etat ca bhagavan pṛcchataḥ me nupūrvaśas

original: BhP_02.08.024/3 tattvato 'rhasyudāhartuṃ prapannāya mahāmune
analyzed: tattvataḥ rhasi udāhartum prapannāya mahā mune

original: BhP_02.08.025/1 atra pramāṇaṃ hi bhavān parameṣṭhī yathātmabhūḥ
analyzed: atra pramāṇam hi bhavān parameṣṭhī yathā ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_02.08.025/3 apare cānutiṣṭhanti pūrveṣāṃ pūrvajaiḥ kṛtam
analyzed: apare ca anutiṣṭhanti pūrveṣām pūrvajaiḥ kṛtam

original: BhP_02.08.026/1 na me 'savaḥ parāyanti brahmann anaśanādamī
analyzed: na me savaḥ parāyanti brahman anaśanāt amī

original: BhP_02.08.026/3 pibato ñcyutapīyūṣam tadvākyābdhiviniḥsṛtam
analyzed: pibataḥ tad vākya abdhi viniḥsṛtam

original: BhP_02.08.027/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.08.027/1 sa upāmantrito rājñā kathāyām iti satpateḥ
analyzed: saḥ upāmantritaḥ rājñā kathāyām iti sat pateḥ

original: BhP_02.08.027/3 brahmarāto bhṛśaṃ prīto viṣṇurātena saṃsadi
analyzed: brahmarātaḥ bhṛśam prītaḥ viṣṇurātena saṃsadi

original: BhP_02.08.028/1 prāha bhāgavataṃ nāma purāṇaṃ brahmasammitam
analyzed: prāha bhāgavatam nāma purāṇam brahma sammitam

original: BhP_02.08.028/3 brahmaṇe bhagavatproktaṃ brahmakalpa upāgate
analyzed: brahmaṇe bhagavat proktam brahma kalpe upāgate

original: BhP_02.08.029/1 yadyat parīkṣidṛṣabhaḥ pāṇḍūnām anupṛcchati
analyzed: yat yat parīkṣit ṛṣabhaḥ pāṇḍūnām anupṛcchati

original: BhP_02.08.029/3 ānupūrvyeṇa tat sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame
analyzed: ānupūrvyeṇa tat sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame

original: BhP_02.09.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.09.001/1 ātmamāyām ṛte rājan parasyānubhavātmanaḥ
analyzed: ātma māyām ṛte rājan parasya anubhava ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.001/3 na ghaṭetārthasambandhaḥ svapnadraṣṭurivāñjasā
analyzed: na ghaṭeta artha sambandhaḥ svapna draṣṭuḥ iva añjasā

original: BhP_02.09.002/1 bahurūpa ivābhāti māyayā bahurūpayā
analyzed: bahu rūpaḥ iva ābhāti māyayā bahu rūpayā

original: BhP_02.09.002/3 ramamāṇo guṇeṣvasyā mamāham iti manyate
analyzed: ramamāṇaḥ guṇeṣu asyāḥ mama aham iti manyate

original: BhP_02.09.003/1 yarhi vāva mahimni sve parasmin kālamāyayoḥ
analyzed: yarhi vā ava mahimni sve parasmin kāla māyayoḥ

original: BhP_02.09.003/3 rameta gatasammohastyaktvodāste tadobhayam
analyzed: rameta gata sammohaḥ tyaktvā udāste tadā ubhayam

original: BhP_02.09.004/1 ātmatattvaviśuddhyarthaṃ yadāha bhagavān ṛtam
analyzed: ātma tattva viśuddhi artham yat āha bhagavān ṛtam

original: BhP_02.09.004/3 brahmaṇe darśayan rūpam avyalīkavratādṛtaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇe darśayan rūpam avyalīka vrata ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.005/1 sa ādidevo jagatāṃ paro guruḥ svadhiṣṇyam āsthāya sisṛkṣayaikṣata
analyzed: saḥ ādidevaḥ jagatām paraḥ guruḥ sva dhiṣṇyam āsthāya sisṛkṣayā aikṣata

original: BhP_02.09.005/3 tāṃ nādhyagacchaddṛśam atra sammatāṃ prapañcanirmāṇavidhiryayā bhavet
analyzed: tām na adhyagacchat dṛśam atra sammatām prapañca nirmāṇa vidhiḥ yayā bhavet

original: BhP_02.09.006/1 sa cintayan dvyakṣaram ekadāmbhasy upāśṛṇoddvirgaditaṃ vaco vibhuḥ
analyzed: sa cintayan dvi akṣaram ekadā ambhasi upāśṛṇot dvis gaditam vacaḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_02.09.006/3 sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśaṃ niṣkiñcanānāṃ nṛpa yaddhanaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṃśam niṣkiñcanānām nṛpa yat dhanam viduḥ

original: BhP_02.09.007/1 niśamya tadvaktṛdidṛkṣayā diśo vilokya tatrānyadapaśyamānaḥ
analyzed: niśamya tad vaktṛ didṛkṣayā diśaḥ vilokya tatra anyat apaśyamānaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.007/3 svadhiṣṇyam āsthāya vimṛśya taddhitaṃ tapasyupādiṣṭa ivādadhe manaḥ
analyzed: sva dhiṣṇyam āsthāya vimṛśya tat hitam tapasi upādiṣṭe iva ādadhe manaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.008/1 divyaṃ sahasrābdam amoghadarśano jitānilātmā vijitobhayendriyaḥ
analyzed: divyam sahasra abdam amogha darśanaḥ jita anila ātmā vijita ubhaya indriyaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.008/3 atapyata smākhilalokatāpanaṃ tapastapīyāṃstapatāṃ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: atapyata sma akhila loka tāpanam tapaḥ tapīyān tapatām samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.009/1 tasmai svalokaṃ bhagavān sabhājitaḥ sandarśayām āsa paraṃ na yatparam
analyzed: tasmai sva lokam bhagavān sabhājitaḥ sandarśayām āsa param na yat param

original: BhP_02.09.009/3 vyapetasaṅkleśavimohasādhvasaṃ svadṛṣṭavadbhirpuruṣairabhiṣṭutam
analyzed: vyapeta saṅkleśa vimoha sādhvasam sva dṛṣṭavadbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ abhiṣṭutam

original: BhP_02.09.010/1 pravartate yatra rajastamastayoḥ sattvaṃ ca miśraṃ na ca kālavikramaḥ
analyzed: pravartate yatra rajaḥ tamaḥ tayoḥ sattvam ca miśram na ca kāla vikramaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.010/3 na yatra māyā kim utāpare harer anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ
analyzed: na yatra māyā kim uta apare hareḥ anuvratāḥ yatra sura asura arcitāḥ

original: BhP_02.09.011/1 śyāmāvadātāḥ śatapatralocanāḥ piśaṅgavastrāḥ surucaḥ supeśasaḥ
analyzed: śyāma avadātāḥ śatapatra locanāḥ piśaṅga vastrāḥ su rucaḥ supeśasaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.011/3 sarve caturbāhava unmiṣanmaṇi pravekaniṣkābharaṇāḥ suvarcasaḥ
analyzed: sarve catur bāhavaḥ unmiṣat maṇi praveka niṣka ābharaṇāḥ su varcasaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.011/5 pravālavaidūryamṛṇālavarcasaḥ parisphuratkuṇḍalamaulimālinaḥ
analyzed: pravāla vaidūrya mṛṇāla varcasaḥ parisphurat kuṇḍala mauli mālinaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.012/1 bhrājiṣṇubhiryaḥ parito virājate lasadvimānāvalibhirmahātmanām
analyzed: bhrājiṣṇubhiḥ yaḥ paritas virājate lasat vimāna āvalibhiḥ mahātmanām

original: BhP_02.09.012/3 vidyotamānaḥ pramadottamādyubhiḥ savidyudabhrāvalibhiryathā nabhaḥ
analyzed: vidyotamānaḥ pramadā uttamā dyubhiḥ sa vidyut abhra āvalibhiḥ yathā nabhaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.013/1 śrīryatra rūpiṇyurugāyapādayoḥ karoti mānaṃ bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: śrīḥ yatra rūpiṇī uru gāya pādayoḥ karoti mānam bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_02.09.013/3 preṅkhaṃ śritā yā kusumākarānugair vigīyamānā priyakarma gāyatī
analyzed: preṅkham śritā yā kusumākara anugaiḥ vigīyamānā priya karma gāyatī

original: BhP_02.09.014/1 dadarśa tatrākhilasātvatāṃ patiṃ śriyaḥ patiṃ yajñapatiṃ jagatpatim
analyzed: dadarśa tatra akhila sātvatām patim śriyaḥ patim yajñapatim jagatpatim

original: BhP_02.09.014/3 sunandanandaprabalārhaṇādibhiḥ svapārṣadāgraiḥ parisevitaṃ vibhum
analyzed: sunanda nanda prabala arhaṇa ādibhiḥ sva pārṣada agraiḥ parisevitam vibhum

original: BhP_02.09.015/1 bhṛtyaprasādābhimukhaṃ dṛgāsavaṃ prasannahāsāruṇalocanānanam
analyzed: bhṛtya prasāda abhimukham dṛś āsavam prasanna hāsa aruṇa locana ānanam

original: BhP_02.09.015/3 kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ caturbhujaṃ pītāṃśukaṃ vakṣasi lakṣitaṃ śriyā
analyzed: kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam catur bhujam pīta aṃśukam vakṣasi lakṣitam śriyā

original: BhP_02.09.016/1 adhyarhaṇīyāsanam āsthitaṃ paraṃ vṛtaṃ catuḥṣoḍaśapañcaśaktibhiḥ
analyzed: adhi arhaṇīya āsanam āsthitam param vṛtam catur ṣoḍaśa pañca śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_02.09.016/3 yuktaṃ bhagaiḥ svairitaratra cādhruvaiḥ sva eva dhāman ramamāṇam īśvaram
analyzed: yuktam bhagaiḥ svaiḥ itaratra ca adhruvaiḥ sve eva dhāman ramamāṇam īśvaram

original: BhP_02.09.017/1 taddarśanāhlādapariplutāntaro hṛṣyattanuḥ premabharāśrulocanaḥ
analyzed: tad darśana āhlāda paripluta antaraḥ hṛṣyat tanuḥ prema bhara aśru locanaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.017/3 nanāma pādāmbujam asya viśvasṛg yat pāramahaṃsyena pathādhigamyate
analyzed: nanāma pāda ambujam asya viśvasṛj yat pāramahaṃsyena pathā adhigamyate

original: BhP_02.09.018/1 taṃ prīyamāṇaṃ samupasthitaṃ kaviṃ prajāvisarge nijaśāsanārhaṇam
analyzed: tam prīyamāṇam samupasthitam kavim prajā visarge nija śāsana arhaṇam

original: BhP_02.09.018/3 babhāṣa īṣatsmitaśociṣā girā priyaḥ priyaṃ prītamanāḥ kare spṛśan
analyzed: babhāṣa īṣat smita śociṣā girā priyaḥ priyam prīta manāḥ kare spṛśan

original: BhP_02.09.019/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_02.09.019/1 tvayāhaṃ toṣitaḥ samyag vedagarbha sisṛkṣayā
analyzed: tvayā aham toṣitaḥ samyak vedagarbha sisṛkṣayā

original: BhP_02.09.019/3 ciraṃ bhṛtena tapasā dustoṣaḥ kūṭayoginām
analyzed: ciram bhṛtena tapasā dustoṣaḥ kūṭa yoginām

original: BhP_02.09.020/1 varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te vareśaṃ mābhivāñchitam
analyzed: varam varaya bhadram te vara īśam mā abhivāñchitam

original: BhP_02.09.020/3 brahmañ chreyaḥpariśrāmaḥ puṃsāṃ maddarśanāvadhiḥ
analyzed: brahmam śreyaḥ pariśrāmaḥ puṃsām mad darśana avadhiḥ

original: BhP_02.09.021/1 manīṣitānubhāvo 'yaṃ mama lokāvalokanam
analyzed: manīṣita anubhāvaḥ yam mama loka avalokanam

original: BhP_02.09.021/3 yadupaśrutya rahasi cakartha paramaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: yat upaśrutya rahasi cakartha paramam tapaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.022/1 pratyādiṣṭaṃ mayā tatra tvayi karmavimohite
analyzed: pratyādiṣṭam mayā tatra tvayi karma vimohite

original: BhP_02.09.022/3 tapo me hṛdayaṃ sākṣādātmāhaṃ tapaso 'nagha
analyzed: tapaḥ me hṛdayam sākṣāt ātmā aham tapasaḥ nagha

original: BhP_02.09.023/1 sṛjāmi tapasaivedaṃ grasāmi tapasā punaḥ
analyzed: sṛjāmi tapasā eva idam grasāmi tapasā punar

original: BhP_02.09.023/3 bibharmi tapasā viśvaṃ vīryaṃ me duścaraṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: bibharmi tapasā viśvam vīryam me duścaram tapaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.024/0 brahmovāca
analyzed: brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_02.09.024/1 bhagavan sarvabhūtānām adhyakṣo 'vasthito guhām
analyzed: bhagavan sarva bhūtānām adhyakṣaḥ vasthitaḥ guhām

original: BhP_02.09.024/3 veda hyapratiruddhena prajñānena cikīrṣitam
analyzed: veda hi a pratiruddhena prajñānena cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_02.09.025/1 tathāpi nāthamānasya nātha nāthaya nāthitam
analyzed: tathā api nāthamānasya nātha nāthaya nāthitam

original: BhP_02.09.025/3 parāvare yathā rūpejānīyāṃ te tvarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: parāvare yathā rūpe jānīyām te tu arūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.026/1 yathātmamāyāyogena nānāśaktyupabṛṃhitam
analyzed: yathā ātma māyā yogena nānā śakti upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_02.09.026/3 vilumpan visṛjan gṛhṇan bibhradātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: vilumpan visṛjan gṛhṇan bibhrat ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_02.09.027/1 krīḍasyamoghasaṅkalpa ūrṇanābhiryathorṇute
analyzed: krīḍasi amogha saṅkalpaḥ ūrṇanābhiḥ yathā ūrṇute

original: BhP_02.09.027/3 tathā tadviṣayāṃ dhehi manīṣāṃ mayi mādhava
analyzed: tathā tad viṣayām dhehi manīṣām mayi mādhava

original: BhP_02.09.028/1 bhagavacchikṣitam ahaṃ karavāṇi hyatandritaḥ
analyzed: bhagavat śikṣitam aham karavāṇi hi atandritaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.028/3 nehamānaḥ prajāsargaṃ badhyeyaṃ yadanugrahāt
analyzed: na īhamānaḥ prajā sargam badhyeyam yad anugrahāt

original: BhP_02.09.029/1 yāvat sakhā sakhyuriveśa te kṛtaḥ prajāvisarge vibhajāmi bho janam
analyzed: yāvat sakhā sakhyuḥ iva īśa te kṛtaḥ prajā visarge vibhajāmi bho janam

original: BhP_02.09.029/3 aviklavaste parikarmaṇi sthito mā me samunnaddhamado ñja māninaḥ
analyzed: aviklavaḥ te parikarmaṇi sthitaḥ mā me samunnaddha madaḥ ñja māninaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.030/0 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_02.09.030/1 jñānaṃ paramaguhyaṃ me yadvijñānasamanvitam
analyzed: jñānam parama guhyam me yat vijñāna samanvitam

original: BhP_02.09.030/3 sarahasyaṃ tadaṅgaṃ ca gṛhāṇa gaditaṃ mayā
analyzed: sa rahasyam tad aṅgam ca gṛhāṇa gaditam mayā

original: BhP_02.09.031/1 yāvān ahaṃ yathābhāvo yadrūpaguṇakarmakaḥ
analyzed: yāvān aham yathā bhāvaḥ yad rūpa guṇa karmakaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.031/3 tathaiva tattvavijñānam astu te madanugrahāt
analyzed: tathā eva tattva vijñānam astu te mad anugrahāt

original: BhP_02.09.032/1 aham evāsam evāgre nānyadyat sadasat param
analyzed: aham eva āsam eva agre na anyat yat sat asat param

original: BhP_02.09.032/3 paścādahaṃ yadetac ca yo 'vaśiṣyeta so 'smyaham
analyzed: paścāt aham yat etat ca yaḥ smi aham

original: BhP_02.09.033/1 ṛte 'rthaṃ yat pratīyeta na pratīyeta cātmani
analyzed: ṛte ṛtham yat pratīyeta na pratīyeta ca ātmani

original: BhP_02.09.033/3 tadvidyādātmano māyāṃ yathābhāso yathā tamaḥ
analyzed: tat vidyāt ātmanaḥ māyām yathā ābhāsaḥ yathā tamaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.034/1 yathā mahānti bhūtāni bhūteṣūccāvaceṣvanu
analyzed: yathā mahānti bhūtāni bhūteṣu uccāvaceṣu anu

original: BhP_02.09.034/3 praviṣṭānyapraviṣṭāni tathā teṣu na teṣvaham
analyzed: praviṣṭāni apraviṣṭāni tathā teṣu na teṣu aham

original: BhP_02.09.035/1 etāvadeva jijñāsyaṃ tattvajijñāsunātmanaḥ
analyzed: etāvat eva jijñāsyam tattva jijñāsunā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.09.035/3 anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ yat syāt sarvatra sarvadā
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām yat syāt sarvatra sarvadā

original: BhP_02.09.036/1 etan mataṃ samātiṣṭha parameṇa samādhinā
analyzed: etat matam samātiṣṭha parameṇa samādhinā

original: BhP_02.09.036/3 bhavān kalpavikalpeṣu na vimuhyati karhicit
analyzed: bhavān kalpa vikalpeṣu na vimuhyati karhicit

original: BhP_02.09.037/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.09.037/1 sampradiśyaivam ajano janānāṃ parameṣṭhinam
analyzed: sampradiśya evam ajanaḥ janānām parameṣṭhinam

original: BhP_02.09.037/3 paśyatastasya tadrūpam ātmano nyaruṇaddhariḥ
analyzed: paśyataḥ tasya tad rūpam ātmanaḥ nyaruṇat hariḥ

original: BhP_02.09.038/1 antarhitendriyārthāya haraye vihitāñjaliḥ
analyzed: antarhita indriya arthāya haraye vihita añjaliḥ

original: BhP_02.09.038/3 sarvabhūtamayo viśvaṃ sasarjedaṃ sa pūrvavat
analyzed: sarva bhūta mayaḥ viśvam sasarja idam sa pūrvavat

original: BhP_02.09.039/1 prajāpatirdharmapatirekadā niyamān yamān
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ dharma patiḥ ekadā niyamān yamān

original: BhP_02.09.039/3 bhadraṃ prajānām anvicchann ātiṣṭhat svārthakāmyayā
analyzed: bhadram prajānām anvicchan ātiṣṭhat sva artha kāmyayā

original: BhP_02.09.040/1 taṃ nāradaḥ priyatamo rikthādānām anuvrataḥ
analyzed: tam nāradaḥ priyatamaḥ rikthādānām anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_02.09.040/3 śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ śīlena praśrayeṇa damena ca
analyzed: śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ śīlena praśrayeṇa damena ca

original: BhP_02.09.041/1 māyāṃ vividiṣan viṣṇormāyeśasya mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: māyām vividiṣan viṣṇoḥ māyā īśasya mahā muniḥ

original: BhP_02.09.041/3 mahābhāgavato rājan pitaraṃ paryatoṣayat
analyzed: mahā bhāgavataḥ rājan pitaram paryatoṣayat

original: BhP_02.09.042/1 tuṣṭaṃ niśāmya pitaraṃ lokānāṃ prapitāmaham
analyzed: tuṣṭam niśāmya pitaram lokānām prapitāmaham

original: BhP_02.09.042/3 devarṣiḥ paripapraccha bhavān yan mānupṛcchati
analyzed: devarṣiḥ paripapraccha bhavān yat mā anupṛcchati

original: BhP_02.09.043/1 tasmā idaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ daśalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tasmai idam bhāgavatam purāṇam daśa lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_02.09.043/3 proktaṃ bhagavatā prāha prītaḥ putrāya bhūtakṛt
analyzed: proktam bhagavatā prāha prītaḥ putrāya bhūtakṛt

original: BhP_02.09.044/1 nāradaḥ prāha munaye sarasvatyāstaṭe nṛpa
analyzed: nāradaḥ prāha munaye sarasvatyāḥ taṭe nṛpa

original: BhP_02.09.044/3 dhyāyate brahma paramaṃ vyāsāyāmitatejase
analyzed: dhyāyate brahma paramam vyāsāya amita tejase

original: BhP_02.09.045/1 yadutāhaṃ tvayā pṛṣṭo vairājāt puruṣādidam
analyzed: yat uta aham tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ vairājāt puruṣāt idam

original: BhP_02.09.045/3 yathāsīt tadupākhyāste praśnān anyāṃśca kṛtsnaśaḥ
analyzed: yathā āsīt tat upākhyāḥ te praśnān anyān ca kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_02.10.001/0 śrīśuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.10.001/1 atra sargo visargaśca sthānaṃ poṣaṇam ūtayaḥ
analyzed: atra sargaḥ visargaḥ ca sthānam poṣaṇam ūtayaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.001/3 manvantareśānukathā nirodho muktirāśrayaḥ
analyzed: manvantara īśa anukathāḥ nirodhaḥ muktiḥ āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.002/1 daśamasya viśuddhyarthaṃ navānām iha lakṣaṇam
analyzed: daśamasya viśuddhi artham navānām iha lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_02.10.002/3 varṇayanti mahātmānaḥ śrutenārthena cāñjasā
analyzed: varṇayanti mahātmānaḥ śrutena arthena ca añjasā

original: BhP_02.10.003/1 bhūtamātrendriyadhiyāṃ janma sarga udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhūtamātra indriya dhiyām janma sargaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.003/3 brahmaṇo guṇavaiṣamyādvisargaḥ pauruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ guṇa vaiṣamyāt visargaḥ pauruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.004/1 sthitirvaikuṇṭhavijayaḥ poṣaṇaṃ tadanugrahaḥ
analyzed: sthitiḥ vaikuṇṭha vijayaḥ poṣaṇam tad anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.004/3 manvantarāṇi saddharma ūtayaḥ karmavāsanāḥ
analyzed: manvantarāṇi sat dharmaḥ ūtayaḥ karma vāsanāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.005/1 avatārānucaritaṃ hareścāsyānuvartinām
analyzed: avatāra anucaritam hareḥ ca asya anuvartinām

original: BhP_02.10.005/3 puṃsām īśakathāḥ proktā nānākhyānopabṛṃhitāḥ
BhP_02.10.006/1 nirodho 'syānuśayanam ātmanaḥ saha śaktibhiḥ
analyzed: nirodhaḥ sya anuśayanam ātmanaḥ saha śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_02.10.006/3 muktirhitvānyathā rūpaṃ svarūpeṇa vyavasthitiḥ
analyzed: muktiḥ hitvā anyathā rūpam sva rūpeṇa vyavasthitiḥ

original: BhP_02.10.007/1 ābhāsaśca nirodhaśca yato 'styadhyavasīyate
analyzed: ābhāsaḥ ca nirodhaḥ ca yatas sti adhyavasīyate

original: BhP_02.10.007/3 sa āśrayaḥ paraṃ brahma paramātmeti śabdyate
analyzed: saḥ āśrayaḥ param brahma paramātmā iti śabdyate

original: BhP_02.10.008/1 yo 'dhyātmiko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ so 'sāvevādhidaivikaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dhyātmikaḥ yam puruṣaḥ saḥ saḥ eva ādhidaivikaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.008/3 yastatrobhayavicchedaḥ puruṣo hyādhibhautikaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tatra ubhaya vicchedaḥ puruṣaḥ hi ādhibhautikaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.009/1 ekam ekatarābhāve yadā nopalabhāmahe
analyzed: ekam ekatara abhāve yadā na upalabhāmahe

original: BhP_02.10.009/3 tritayaṃ tatra yo veda sa ātmā svāśrayāśrayaḥ
analyzed: tritayam tatra yaḥ veda saḥ ātmā sva āśraya āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.010/1 puruṣo 'ṇḍaṃ vinirbhidya yadāsau sa vinirgataḥ
analyzed: puruṣaḥ ṇḍam vinirbhidya yadā asau sa vinirgataḥ

original: BhP_02.10.010/3 ātmano 'yanam anvicchann apo 'srākṣīc chuciḥ śucīḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ yanam anvicchan apaḥ srākṣīt śuciḥ śucīḥ

original: BhP_02.10.011/1 tāsvavātsīt svasṛṣṭāsu sahasraṃ parivatsarān
analyzed: tāsu avātsīt sva sṛṣṭāsu sahasram parivatsarān

original: BhP_02.10.011/3 tena nārāyaṇo nāma yadāpaḥ puruṣodbhavāḥ
analyzed: tena nārāyaṇaḥ nāma yadā āpaḥ puruṣa udbhavāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.012/1 dravyaṃ karma ca kālaśca svabhāvo jīva eva ca
analyzed: dravyam karma ca kālaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_02.10.012/3 yadanugrahataḥ santi na santi yadupekṣayā
analyzed: yad anugrahataḥ santi na santi yad upekṣayā

original: BhP_02.10.013/1 eko nānātvam anvicchan yogatalpāt samutthitaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ nānātvam anvicchan yogatalpāt samutthitaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.013/3 vīryaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ devo māyayā vyasṛjat tridhā
analyzed: vīryam hiraṇmayam devaḥ māyayā vyasṛjat tridhā

original: BhP_02.10.014/1 adhidaivam athādhyātmam adhibhūtam iti prabhuḥ
analyzed: adhidaivam atha adhyātmam adhibhūtam iti prabhuḥ

original: BhP_02.10.014/3 athaikaṃ pauruṣaṃ vīryaṃ tridhābhidyata tac chṛṇu
analyzed: atha ekam pauruṣam vīryam tridhā abhidyata tat śṛṇu

original: BhP_02.10.015/1 antaḥ śarīra ākāśāt puruṣasya viceṣṭataḥ
analyzed: antar śarīre ākāśāt puruṣasya viceṣṭataḥ

original: BhP_02.10.015/3 ojaḥ saho balaṃ jajñe tataḥ prāṇo mahān asuḥ
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ balam jajñe tatas prāṇaḥ mahān asuḥ

original: BhP_02.10.016/1 anuprāṇanti yaṃ prāṇāḥ prāṇantaṃ sarvajantuṣu
analyzed: anuprāṇanti yam prāṇāḥ prāṇantam sarva jantuṣu

original: BhP_02.10.016/3 apānantam apānanti naradevam ivānugāḥ
analyzed: apānantam apānanti naradevam iva anugāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.017/1 prāṇenākṣipatā kṣut tṛḍantarā jāyate vibhoḥ
analyzed: prāṇena ākṣipatā kṣudh tṛṣ antarā jāyate vibhoḥ

original: BhP_02.10.017/3 pipāsato jakṣataśca prāṅ mukhaṃ nirabhidyata
analyzed: pipāsataḥ jakṣataḥ ca prāk mukham nirabhidyata

original: BhP_02.10.018/1 mukhatastālu nirbhinnaṃjihvā tatropajāyate
analyzed: mukhataḥ tālu nirbhinnam jihvā tatra upajāyate

original: BhP_02.10.018/3 tato nānāraso jajñe jihvayā yo 'dhigamyate
analyzed: tatas nānā rasaḥ jajñe jihvayā yaḥ dhigamyate

original: BhP_02.10.019/1 vivakṣormukhato bhūmno vahnirvāg vyāhṛtaṃ tayoḥ
analyzed: vivakṣoḥ mukhataḥ bhūmnaḥ vahniḥ vāc vyāhṛtam tayoḥ

original: BhP_02.10.019/3 jale caitasya suciraṃ nirodhaḥ samajāyata
analyzed: jale ca etasya su ciram nirodhaḥ samajāyata

original: BhP_02.10.020/1 nāsike nirabhidyetāṃ dodhūyati nabhasvati
analyzed: nāsike nirabhidyetām dodhūyati nabhasvati

original: BhP_02.10.020/3 tatra vāyurgandhavaho ghrāṇo nasi jighṛkṣataḥ
analyzed: tatra vāyuḥ gandhavahaḥ ghrāṇaḥ jighṛkṣataḥ

original: BhP_02.10.021/1 yadātmani nirālokam ātmānaṃ ca didṛkṣataḥ
analyzed: yadā ātmani nirālokam ātmānam ca didṛkṣataḥ

original: BhP_02.10.021/3 nirbhinne hyakṣiṇī tasya jyotiścakṣurguṇagrahaḥ
analyzed: nirbhinne hi akṣiṇī tasya jyotiḥ cakṣuḥ guṇa grahaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.022/1 bodhyamānasya ṛṣibhirātmanastaj jighṛkṣataḥ
analyzed: bodhyamānasya ṛṣibhiḥ ātmanaḥ tat jighṛkṣataḥ

original: BhP_02.10.022/3 karṇau ca nirabhidyetāṃ diśaḥ śrotraṃ guṇagrahaḥ
analyzed: karṇau ca nirabhidyetām diśaḥ śrotram guṇa grahaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.023/1 vastuno mṛdukāṭhinya laghugurvoṣṇaśītatām
analyzed: vastunaḥ laghu guru oṣṇa śīta tām

original: BhP_02.10.023/3 jighṛkṣatastvaṅ nirbhinnā tasyāṃ romamahīruhāḥ
analyzed: jighṛkṣataḥ tvac nirbhinnā tasyām roma mahīruhāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.023/5 tatra cāntarbahirvātastvacā labdhaguṇo vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tatra ca antar bahis vātaḥ tvacā labdha guṇaḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.024/1 hastau ruruhatustasya nānākarmacikīrṣayā
analyzed: hastau ruruhatuḥ tasya nānā karma cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_02.10.024/3 tayostu balavān indra ādānam ubhayāśrayam
analyzed: tayoḥ tu balavān indraḥ ādānam ubhaya āśrayam

original: BhP_02.10.025/1 gatiṃ jigīṣataḥ pādau ruruhāte 'bhikāmikām
analyzed: gatim jigīṣataḥ pādau ruruhāte bhikāmikām

original: BhP_02.10.025/3 padbhyāṃ yajñaḥ svayaṃ havyaṃ karmabhiḥ kriyate nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: padbhyām yajñaḥ svayam havyam karmabhiḥ kriyate nṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_02.10.026/1 nirabhidyata śiśno vai prajānandāmṛtārthinaḥ
analyzed: nirabhidyata śiśnaḥ vai prajā ānanda amṛta arthinaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.026/3 upastha āsīt kāmānāṃ priyaṃ tadubhayāśrayam
analyzed: upasthaḥ āsīt kāmānām priyam tad ubhaya āśrayam

original: BhP_02.10.027/1 utsisṛkṣordhātumalaṃ nirabhidyata vai gudam
analyzed: utsisṛkṣoḥ dhātumalam nirabhidyata vai gudam

original: BhP_02.10.027/3 tataḥ pāyustato mitra utsarga ubhayāśrayaḥ
analyzed: tatas pāyuḥ tatas mitraḥ utsargaḥ ubhaya āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.028/1 āsisṛpsoḥ puraḥ puryā nābhidvāram apānataḥ
analyzed: āsisṛpsoḥ puras puryāḥ nābhi dvāram apānataḥ

original: BhP_02.10.028/3 tatrāpānastato mṛtyuḥ pṛthaktvam ubhayāśrayam
analyzed: tatra apānaḥ tatas mṛtyuḥ pṛthaktvam ubhaya āśrayam

original: BhP_02.10.029/1 āditsorannapānānām āsan kukṣyantranāḍayaḥ
analyzed: āditsoḥ anna pānānām āsan kukṣi antra nāḍayaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.029/3 nadyaḥ samudrāśca tayostuṣṭiḥ puṣṭistadāśraye
analyzed: nadyaḥ samudrāḥ ca tayoḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ tad āśraye

original: BhP_02.10.030/1 nididhyāsorātmamāyāṃ hṛdayaṃ nirabhidyata
analyzed: nididhyāsoḥ ātma māyām hṛdayam nirabhidyata

original: BhP_02.10.030/3 tato manaścandra iti saṅkalpaḥ kāma eva ca
analyzed: tatas manaḥ candraḥ iti saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_02.10.031/1 tvakcarmamāṃsarudhira medomajjāsthidhātavaḥ
analyzed: tvac carma māṃsa rudhira medaḥ majja asthi dhātavaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.031/3 bhūmyaptejomayāḥ sapta prāṇo vyomāmbuvāyubhiḥ
analyzed: bhūmi ap tejaḥ mayāḥ sapta prāṇaḥ vyoma ambu vāyubhiḥ

original: BhP_02.10.032/1 guṇātmakānīndriyāṇi bhūtādiprabhavā guṇāḥ
analyzed: guṇa ātmakāni indriyāṇi bhūtādi prabhavāḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.032/3 manaḥ sarvavikārātmā buddhirvijñānarūpiṇī
analyzed: manaḥ sarva vikāra ātmā buddhiḥ vijñāna rūpiṇī

original: BhP_02.10.033/1 etadbhagavato rūpaṃ sthūlaṃ te vyāhṛtaṃ mayā
analyzed: etat bhagavataḥ rūpam sthūlam te vyāhṛtam mayā

original: BhP_02.10.033/3 mahyādibhiścāvaraṇairaṣṭabhirbahirāvṛtam
analyzed: mahī ādibhiḥ ca āvaraṇaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ bahis āvṛtam

original: BhP_02.10.034/1 ataḥ paraṃ sūkṣmatamam avyaktaṃ nirviśeṣaṇam
analyzed: atas param sūkṣmatamam avyaktam nirviśeṣaṇam

original: BhP_02.10.034/3 anādimadhyanidhanaṃ nityaṃ vāṅmanasaḥ param
analyzed: an ādi madhya nidhanam nityam vāc manasaḥ param

original: BhP_02.10.035/1 amunī bhagavadrūpe mayā te hyanuvarṇite
analyzed: amunī bhagavat rūpe mayā te hi anuvarṇite

original: BhP_02.10.035/3 ubhe api na gṛhṇanti māyāsṛṣṭe vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: ubhe api na gṛhṇanti māyā sṛṣṭe vipaścitaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.036/1 sa vācyavācakatayā bhagavān brahmarūpadhṛk
analyzed: sa vācya vācaka tayā bhagavān brahma rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_02.10.036/3 nāmarūpakriyā dhatte sakarmākarmakaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: nāma rūpa kriyāḥ dhatte sa karmā akarmakaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_02.10.037/1 prajāpatīn manūn devān ṛṣīn pitṛgaṇān pṛthak
analyzed: prajāpatīn manūn devān ṛṣīn pitṛ gaṇān pṛthak

original: BhP_02.10.037/3 siddhacāraṇagandharvān vidyādhrāsuraguhyakān
analyzed: siddha cāraṇa gandharvān vidyādhra asura guhyakān

original: BhP_02.10.038/1 kinnarāpsaraso nāgān sarpān kimpuruṣān narān
analyzed: kinnara apsarasaḥ nāgān sarpān kimpuruṣān narān

original: BhP_02.10.038/3 māt rakṣaḥpiśācāṃśca pretabhūtavināyakān
analyzed: rakṣaḥ piśācān ca preta bhūta vināyakān

original: BhP_02.10.039/1 kūṣmāṇḍonmādavetālān yātudhānān grahān api
analyzed: kūṣmāṇḍa unmāda vetālān yātudhānān grahān api

original: BhP_02.10.039/3 khagān mṛgān paśūn vṛkṣān girīn nṛpa sarīsṛpān
analyzed: khagān mṛgān paśūn vṛkṣān girīn nṛpa sarīsṛpān

original: BhP_02.10.040/1 dvividhāścaturvidhā ye 'nye jalasthalanabhaukasaḥ
analyzed: dvividhāḥ caturvidhāḥ ye nye jala sthala nabha okasaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.040/3 kuśalākuśalā miśrāḥ karmaṇāṃ gatayastvimāḥ
analyzed: kuśala akuśalāḥ miśrāḥ karmaṇām gatayaḥ tu imāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.041/1 sattvaṃ rajastama iti tisraḥ suranṛnārakāḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti tisraḥ sura nṛ nārakāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.041/3 tatrāpyekaikaśo rājan bhidyante gatayastridhā
analyzed: tatra api ekaikaśas rājan bhidyante gatayaḥ tridhā

original: BhP_02.10.041/5 yadaikaikataro 'nyābhyāṃ svabhāva upahanyate
analyzed: yadā eka ekataraḥ nyābhyām svabhāvaḥ upahanyate

original: BhP_02.10.042/1 sa evedaṃ jagaddhātā bhagavān dharmarūpadhṛk
analyzed: saḥ eva idam jagat dhātā bhagavān dharma rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_02.10.042/3 puṣṇāti sthāpayan viśvaṃ tiryaṅnarasurādibhiḥ
analyzed: puṣṇāti sthāpayan viśvam tiryak nara sura ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_02.10.043/1 tataḥ kālāgnirudrātmā yat sṛṣṭam idam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tatas kālāgni rudra ātmā yat sṛṣṭam idam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.043/3 sanniyacchati tat kāle ghanānīkam ivānilaḥ
analyzed: san niyacchati tat kāle ghana anīkam iva anilaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.044/1 itthambhāvena kathito bhagavān bhagavattamaḥ
analyzed: ittham bhāvena kathitaḥ bhagavān bhagavattamaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.044/3 netthambhāvena hi paraṃ draṣṭum arhanti sūrayaḥ
analyzed: na ittham bhāvena hi param draṣṭum arhanti sūrayaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.045/1 nāsya karmaṇi janmādau parasyānuvidhīyate
analyzed: na asya karmaṇi janma ādau parasya anuvidhīyate

original: BhP_02.10.045/3 kartṛtvapratiṣedhārthaṃ māyayāropitaṃ hi tat
analyzed: kartṛ tva pratiṣedha artham māyayā āropitam hi tat

original: BhP_02.10.046/1 ayaṃ tu brahmaṇaḥ kalpaḥ savikalpa udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu brahmaṇaḥ kalpaḥ sa vikalpaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.046/3 vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo yatra sargāḥ prākṛtavaikṛtāḥ
analyzed: vidhiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ yatra sargāḥ prākṛta vaikṛtāḥ

original: BhP_02.10.047/1 parimāṇaṃ ca kālasya kalpalakṣaṇavigraham
analyzed: parimāṇam ca kālasya kalpa lakṣaṇa vigraham

original: BhP_02.10.047/3 yathā purastādvyākhyāsye pādmaṃ kalpam atho śṛṇu
analyzed: yathā purastāt vyākhyāsye pādmam kalpam atho śṛṇu

original: BhP_02.10.048/0 śaunaka uvāca
analyzed: śaunakaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.10.048/1 yadāha no bhavān sūta kṣattā bhāgavatottamaḥ
analyzed: yat āha naḥ bhavān sūta kṣattā bhāgavata uttamaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.048/3 cacāra tīrthāni bhuvastyaktvā bandhūn sudustyajān
analyzed: cacāra tīrthāni bhuvaḥ tyaktvā bandhūn su dustyajān

original: BhP_02.10.049/1 kṣattuḥ kauśāravestasya saṃvādo 'dhyātmasaṃśritaḥ
analyzed: kṣattuḥ kauśāraveḥ tasya saṃvādaḥ dhyātma saṃśritaḥ

original: BhP_02.10.049/3 yadvā sa bhagavāṃstasmai pṛṣṭastattvam uvāca ha
analyzed: yat vā sa bhagavān tasmai pṛṣṭaḥ tattvam uvāca ha

original: BhP_02.10.050/1 brūhi nastadidaṃ saumya vidurasya viceṣṭitam
analyzed: brūhi naḥ tat idam saumya vidurasya viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_02.10.050/3 bandhutyāganimittaṃ ca yathaivāgatavān punaḥ
analyzed: bandhu tyāga nimittam ca yathā eva āgatavān punar

original: BhP_02.10.051/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_02.10.051/1 rājñā parīkṣitā pṛṣṭo yadavocan mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: rājñā parīkṣitā pṛṣṭaḥ yat avocat mahā muniḥ

original: BhP_02.10.051/3 tadvo 'bhidhāsye śṛṇuta rāajñaḥ praśnānusārataḥ
analyzed: tat vaḥ bhidhāsye śṛṇuta rājñaḥ praśna anusārataḥ
